column2: A heated debate has raged in Armenian academic circles recently, on the issue of the greatest extent of Armenian state and cultural influence. Armenian archeologists have unearthed traces of art and implements of an Armenia character in Eastern Turkey, but others are claiming that Armenian culture spread much further. We can finance some more expeditions to clarify the issue, yet this might bring us trouble from the Ottoman authorities
We shouldn't risk conflict with the Empire
column13: Мы не должны рисковать конфликтом с турками

column2: It turned out that during the ancient times our country was way bigger and more developed, then it was previously thought. Our archaeologists have found several long-forgotten sites of cultural and historical importance to our people, including old temples, libraries and monuments. it seems we were ignorant of our glorious past for way too long.
This is a great day for Armenia
column13: Это великий день для всей Армении

column2: The Armenian Government has recently funded the production of a series of archeological works claiming that the culture of Eastern Turkey has persistently been dominated by Armenian cultural and political influence. This might encourage more rebellious elements in Armenia to become more persistent.
Archeology?!?  Stop wasting my valuable time!
column13: Археология?! Хватит тратить мое драгоценное время!

column2: Take care of this idiocy once and for all!
column13: Позаботьтесь об этом идиотизме раз и навсегда!

column2: The imperial authorities have arrested our archaeologists and burned their most precious findings! They are barbarians, how can civilized people behave like that? This has gone too far!
column13: Имперские власти арестовали наших археологов и уничтожили их самые ценные находки! Это варварство, как могут цивилизованные люди так поступать?. Это зашло слишком далеко!

column2: The Armenian countryside has been a recent hot bed of Anti-Ottoman sentiment. The continuing nature of the Ottoman rule is being blamed for the agitation but some in the government are looking at the Apostolic church as the source.
column13: Армянские деревни ставновятся очагами антиосманских настроений. В правительстве многие считают, что источником агитации является Апостольская церковь.

column2: In an attempt to further the assimilation of the Armenian people into the Ottoman society the Armenian government has banned the teaching of Armenian written literature calling it biased and inaccurate. Only Ottoman authorized materials will be available for teaching and all unauthorized materials are to be turned over to the government.
The Apostolic Church Protests the New Law
column13: Апостольская церковь протестует против нового закона

column2: The Church has protested the creation of the new law as being a direct threat to its practice and traditions. They have criticised the creation of the new law and has refused to hand over any material in the church. The church's refusal to comply with the law is causing serious internal problems to our state. What shall we do ?
We should listen to the priests

Armenian Agitators have burned several Turkish books and have smashed several shops. The Ottoman delegation is upset at the current anti-Ottoman sentiment that is running through Armenia. They are demanding that we do something to safeguard ethic Turks.
Arrest the priests and the agitators
We can not oppose national will
column13: Мы не можем противостоять народной воле

column2: The arrest of the priests has led to a full scale revolt in Armenia and the government is in panic. There seems no way to stop the revolt. We could request help from the Ottomans but this could increase the Ottoman influence on our country. However, if we don't ask for help the government will probably collapse.
Government is forced to flee country
From the ashes of the old Armenian government, a new glorious Armenian government has risen. No longer will the Armenian people suffer under the yoke of the Ottoman Empire.
column13: Из пепла старого армянского правительство восстало славное новое. Армянский народ больше не будет страдать под игом Османской империи.

column2: The Armenians have arrested several of the people who were responsible for the unrest there. They have requested that we send in troops to put down the unrest that has arisen due to the arrests. The fear is that the country will once again be drawn into a long drawn out occupation and there is also the Russian question as the presence of Turkish troops in Armenia would no doubt cause friction.
The Ottomans have sent troops into Armenia to quell the unrest and they will shortly restore order in the country.
column13: Турки послали войска для восстановления порядка в стране.

column2: With the agitators arrested Armenia as a whole seems to have calmed down for now but there is a seathing undercurrent of nationalism which could rise again at any point.
column13: Арест агитаторов позволил восстановить порядок, но националистическое движение не уничтожено и восстание может вспыхнуть в любой момент.

column2: The Armenians Have Refused to Arrest the Agitators
The foolish Armenians have refused to arrest the agitators that have shown disrespect to the Ottoman Empire. We must make a statement about this.
column13: Глупые армяне отказались арестовывать агитаторов, которые действуют против Османской империи. Что мы предпримем?

column2: Lodge a protest and hope they comply
column13: Выразить протест, и надеятся, что они подчинятся

column2: The Ottomans have formally protested our unwillingness to arrest the agitators. This protest could lead to larger problems with Turkey but if we do go ahead with the arrests it could lead to further unrest.
column13: Турки официально выразили протест, нашему отказу ареста агитаторов. Этот протест может повлечь серьезные проблемы, но аресты приведут к большим беспорядкам.

column2: The Ottomans have threatened war over the refusal to arrest the agitators. This would be a disaster for Armenia if it happened but if we do back down there will probably be a lot of unrest all over Armenia.
column13: Османы угрожают войной, если мы не арестуем агитаторов. Это будет катастрофой для Армении, но аресты приведут к дальнейшим беспорядкам.

column2: We will not bow to their demands

For many years, we have ruled over Armenia. But today, our threats of war have pushed Armenia beyond any reason, as they have decided to break free from our sphere of influence, inciting riots in the eastern parts of our empire inhabited by Armenian minorities in the process. How should we react to this mess?
The Armenians have ignored our complaints
The foolish Armenians have refused to preperly address our complaints against a wave of nationalism rising in Armenia. We must make a statement about this.

Our glorious armed forces have once again succesfully seized entire Armenia. Only question that remains is what should be done with territory of Armenia. While armed forces and nationalist politicians argue for immediate integration of Armenia, liberal factions in our society are arguing for independent Armenia.

A new Tsar has been crowned in Russia! Historically our people served the Emperors of Russia faithfully and were rewarded generously with both liberty and security. Now, while we do have complete freedom, we are surrounded by potential enemies. A general council of all the clans should be held to decide what to do.
We shall serve the new Tsar on our own terms.
column13: Мы будем служить новому царю, но наших условиях

column2: It is time to return to the fold, we should submit.
We are now free Cossacks and need no master!
column13: Мы теперь свободные казаки, и нам не нужен правитель!

column2: The Cossacks have offered to serve us but ask for us to respect their independence. How should we respond?
column13: Казаки предложили служить нам, но с сохранением их независимости. Как мы отреагируем?

column2: We welcome the return of our loyal allies.
We must decline their offer politely.
Upstarts, your lands are rightfully Russian!
column13: Их земли по праву принадлежат нам!

column2: The Cossacks have broken with centuries of tradition and renounced all ties with our Empire! How should we respond?
column13: Казаки порушили вековые традиции и разорвали все отношения с нашей империей. Как мы отреагируем?

column2: Ignore them, they may freeze on the steppes.
column13: Игнорировать их - пусть мерзнут в степях одни

column2: Send gifts to show the Tsar's generosity.
column13: Отправьте подарки, чтобы показать щедрость царя.

column2: What the Tsar has given them the Tsar shall take away!
column13: Что царь им дал, то он и заберет!

column2: The Russians have asserted their rights over our lands. Though our warriors are brave we may not be able to win a war against the Russians by ourselves. Perhaps it is time for us to seek allies? The Germans supported our cause after the war and might aid us again. We also have historic ties with the Turkic peoples.
The Germans might help us again.
The Turks and the Kazakhs are people like us.
The Cossacks feel threatened by the growing power of Russia and have approached us, seeking to be our allies.  How should we react?
column13: Казаки опасаются возрастающей силы России и просят нас стать союзниками. Как мы отреагируем?

column2: Give them security from German arms, but nothing more.
column13: Дать им гарантии безопасности, но не более

column2: Stable relationship with Russia is more important.
column13: Хорошие отношения с Россией более важны

column2: The Cossacks approach the Ottoman Empire

The Cossacks feel threatened by the growing power of Russia and have approached us, seeking to be our allies. If we can form an alliance with the Cossacks it will be easier to bring the Azeris and Kazakhs into a general Pan-Turkic alliance. How should we react?
This is a great day for all Turks!
column13: Это великий день для всех турков!

column2: We will guarantee the security of the Cossacks but nothing more.
column13: Дать им гарантии безопасности, но не более

column2: No.  The Empire has too many problems already.
column13: Нет, у империи и так много проблем

column2: The Ottomans and the Cossacks have signed an alliance and have suggested that we join them in order to preserve the security of all Turkic peoples. We are sandwiched between Turkestan and Russia and this could be an excellent way of maintaining our independence.
Yes.  We need all the allies we can get.

The Ottomans and the Cossacks have signed an alliance and have suggested that we join them in order to preserve the security of all Turkic peoples. We are very vulnerable in the Caucasus and this could be an excellent way of maintaining our independence.
column13: Турки и казаки заключили союз, и предложили нам и казахам присоедиться ради безопасности всех тюрков. Мы очень уязвимы на Кавказе, и это может быть отличным способом сохранить нашу независимость.

column2: Yes.  We need all the allies we can get.

The Ottomans and the Cossacks have signed an alliance and have suggested that we join them in order to preserve the security of all Turkic peoples. We are very vulnerable in the Caucasus and this could be an excellent way of maintaining our independence.
column13: Турки и казаки заключили союз, и предложили нам и казахам присоедиться ради безопасности всех тюрков. Мы очень уязвимы на Кавказе, и это может быть отличным способом сохранить нашу независимость.

column2: Yes.  We need all the allies we can get.
Our Russian neighbours seem to be taking a more active role in global affairs.  We should decide our stance towards them before they decide to deal with us themselves.
column13: Наши русские соседи начали играть более серьезную роль в мировой политике. Мы должны начать переговоры с ними, пока они не взялись за нас.

column2: We shall serve the Russians as we have always done.
column13: Мы должны служить русским, как делали это всегда

column2: We shall stand with the Russians independently.
column13: Присоединиться к ним с сохранением автономии

column2: We are free Cossacks and need no master!
column13: Мы свободные казаки и нам не нужен правитель!

column2: The Cossacks have offered to serve us as long as we promise to maintain their freedoms and sovereignity within the Don-Kuban region.
column13: Казаки предложили служить нам, если мы сохраним их свободы и суверинетет в донско-кубанском регионе

column2: We shall welcome the Cossacks with open arms!
We are sorry, our interests lie elsewhere.
The Cossacks have no place in the modern world.  Their lands are Russian!
column13: Казакам нет места в новом мире, их земли принадлежат нам!

column2: The Cossacks have offered to enter into a full alliance with Russia.
We accept the offer of our Cossack brothers.
Russia has no need of an alliance with the Cossacks.
column13: России не нужен союз с казаками

column2: The Cossacks have no place in the modern world. Their lands are Russian!
column13: Казакам нет места в новом мире, их земли принадлежат нам!

column2: The Cossacks have asserted that they are free from Russia's sphere of influence! What should we do?
column13: Казаки решили, что они теперь вне сферы влияния России. Как мы отреагируем?

column2: What the Cossacks say is of no interest
The Cossacks have no place in the modern world. Their lands are Russian!
column13: Казакам нет места в новом мире, их земли принадлежат нам!

column2: The rhetoric of the Russian government has become very worrying of late, they seem to want to take back all former Russian lands. We should approach them while they are busy elsewhere before they decide to deal with us themselves.
column13: Деятельность правительства России в последнее время вызывает беспокойство. Похоже, они хотят вернуть все бывшие земли империи. Нам нужно вступить с ними в переговоры, пока они не взялись за нас.

column2: We shall offer to serve the Russians as we have always done.
column13: Мы должны служить русским, как делали это всегда

column2: We shall stand with the Russians independently.
column13: Присоединиться к ним с сохранением автономии

column2: We are free Cossacks and need no masters!
column13: Мы свободные казаки и нам не нужен правитель!

column2: The Cossacks have offered to serve us as long as we promise to maintain their freedoms and sovereignty within the Don-Kuban region.
column13: Казаки предложили служить нам, если мы сохраним их свободы и суверинетет в донско-кубанском регионе

column2: We shall welcome the Cossacks with open arms!
We are sorry, our interests lie elsewhere.
The Cossacks have no place in the modern world. Their lands are Russian!
column13: Казакам нет места в новом мире, их земли принадлежат нам!

column2: The Cossacks have offered to enter into a full alliance with Russia.
We accept the offer of our Cossack brothers.
Russia has no need of an alliance with the Cossacks.
column13: России не нужен союз с казаками

column2: The Cossacks have no place in the modern world. Their lands are Russian!
column13: Казакам нет места в новом мире, их земли принадлежат нам!

column2: The Cossacks have asserted that they are free from Russia's sphere of influence! What should we do?
column13: Казаки решили, что они теперь вне сферы влияния России. Как мы отреагируем?

column2: The Cossacks have no place in the modern world. Their lands are Russian!
column13: Казакам нет места в новом мире, их земли принадлежат нам!

column2: We shall show those stinking Cossacks who's boss! Charge!
column13: Мы покажем казакам, кто хозяин степей! Вперед!

column2: The Tsar Comes to the Don

The Tsar has come to Krasnodar to be formally recognised as Overlord of the Cossack territories. A grand council has been held and all the Cossack clans have sworn fealty to their new Emperor. Our people rejoice all along the Don and the Kuban!
column13: Царь прибыл в Краснодар, для официального признания его правителем новых земель. Все казаки поклялись в верности императору и начались празднества по всей стране!

column2: The Tsar Comes to the Don

To fulfill the agreement with the Cossacks the Tsar has visited Krasnodar to be formally recognised as Overlord of the Cossack territories. A grand council has been held and all the Cossack clans have sworn fealty to their new Emperor. The Cossacks rejoice all along the Don and the Kuban, the whole ceremony has been relayed across the Empire by radio broadcast and our subjects flock to watch the newsreels in the cinema!
God Save The Tsar! A triumph of propaganda!

With Russian control over the Kuban steppes stabilized some members of our goverment think that now the time is ripe for the integration of Don-Kuban into the growing Russian empire. It would now be quite easy to pass a series of laws which would ensure that the region is more firmly integrated into Russia.
It is time for Russia to directly rule over the Kuban steppes!
column13: Настало время для того, чтобы Россия непосредственно управляла Кубанскими степями!

column2: Areas of the former Cossack state are now firmly integrated into mother Russia.
column13: Области бывшего казацкого государства вновь в составе России.

column2: Berlin Stock Crisis comes to the Don-Kuban Republic
column13: Черный понедельник ударил по Доно-Кубанскому Союзу!

column2: As predicted the republic's finances and economy are in deep crisis. The average Cossack faces problems selling his products and a number of factories are closing. This means that various dangerous elements will have a greater impact upon the political landscape of the Cossack republic.
God save us from the worst.
With the first wave of the crisis slowly passing by, some less affected branches of the economy have bounced off the bottom. Still, the overall state of our economy does not look optimistic...
column13: Мы пережели первую волну кризиса, некоторые отрасли нашей экономики пострадали меньше других. Тем не менее, общее состояние нашей экономики не внушает оптимизма...

column2: Letґs hope stabilisation will come soon.
The economy continues to regain pre-crisis efficiency.
column13: Экономика продолжает восстанавливаться до докризисных показателей.

column2: An Illegal trade union was found
We have found another secret trade union in one of our factories. Workers have united to demand higher wages and better workplaces. We must blame the spread of socialist propaganda for this!
column13: На одном из наших заводов был организован тайный профсоюз. Рабочили объединились, чтобы добиться повышения заработной платы и улучшения условий труда. Но мы то понимаем, что это все социалистическая пропаганда!

column2: Disband the union and arrest the workers!
Allow to operate but watch them closely
column13: Пусть действует, но мы будем наблюдать за ним

column2: The Chechen minority is causing problems!

Yesterday, on the tenth aniversary of our annexation of the Mountainous Republic of the Northern Caucasus, various politicians and major Islamic religious figures have ignited strikes and riots in Grozny. Production in the city's factories and oil refineries has been stopped and large parts of population are on hunger strikes. Leaders of this city-wide strike have announced that they will fight for the Mountainous Republic of the Northern Caucasus no matter what consequences they will face.
In an effort to prevent the potential conflict which could disrupt our fragile state we have entered negotiations with various Chechen leaders. What shall we offer them?
column13: Чтобы предотвратить конфликт, мы вступили в переговоры с лидерами чеченцев. Что мы им предложим?

column2: Offer them religious and cultural autonomy.
Demand an end to the strikes and riots instead!
Our offer to the rebellious population of Caucasus was received by representatives of revolters and now we are awaiting their response...
Our offer to the revolting population of the Caucasus was received by representatives of rebels and now we are awaiting their response...

With failure of our attempt to solve problems with Chechens through negotiations, armed forces of our state have launched an offensive, which aim is to clear Chechenya of all revolters. Our forces advancing directly along road from Vladikavkaz to Grozny have easily defeated few scattered rebel units, but then have entered serious resistance on the outskirts of Grozny. The rebels have dug themselves on the nearby mountains in effort to keep us from entering Grozny.

After failure of attempt to immediatly storm Grozny, our armed forces were forced to dug around rebel capital Grozny to try and force it to surrender. Hovewer due to our inability to force rebels to surrender, other guerillas have risen up in our rear and are threatening our supply positions. Our only chance how to prevent large scale uprising through Caucasus is to seize Grozny as soon as possible....
The Armed forces have captured Grozny !
The Rebels have regrouped and launched a counter-offensive

Our defeat in the siege of Grozny had given hope to other Caucasian nationalities. What started just as a uprising of Chechnyan nation against our state, as almost all Caucasian nationalities have taken arms to try and gain freedom. What shall we do ?
Mountainous Republic of the Northern Caucasus
Mountainous Republic of the Northern Caucasus still exists!

Even the concentration of our elite armed forces could not break apart the rebellious state of Kurdistan. Some members of the general staff suggest that continuing with this fruitless effort greatly weakens our forces facing the hostile Arabian states of Hejaz and Egypt. Shall we recognize the independence of Kurdistan?
After a long and brutal contest in Caucasus we have finally subdued troublesome nationalities inhabiting this part of world. At least for now.....
They will trouble us no longer !

A small feud over land has escalated into a major riot between Russian peasants and the nearby Cossacks. The police has arrested leaders of these anti-Cossack riots and their lands has been confiscated.
column13: Вражда за землю стала причиной спора между русскими крестьянами и казаками. Полиция аррестовала лидеров антиказацких выступлений и конфисковала землю.

column2: They should go back to Russia where they belong!
Pyotr Krasnov, hero of the cossack people, passed away in his dacha near Grozny.
column13: Петр Краснов, казацкий герой, умер на своей даче около Грозного.

column2: Although our admission into Mitteleuropa has provided us with some measure of security it seems that with our awakening northern neighbour it might not be not enough. Our top military leaders propose to solve this situation via creating extensive net of fortifications along borders with Russia, which if linked with already existing Ukrainian part of Ostwall will surely stop any kind of assault.

Our dilligent engineers and soldiers have completed first part of light fortification line along borders of Don-Kuban union with Russia. Shall we continue with its expansion or are such fortifications sufficient ?

Our dilligent engineers and soldiers have completed another part of light fortification line along borders of Don-Kuban union with Russia. Shall we continue with its expansion or are such fortifications sufficient ?

Our dilligent engineers and soldiers have completed another part of light fortification line along borders of Don-Kuban union with Russia. Shall we continue with its expansion or are such fortifications sufficient ?
Our dilligent engineers and soldiers have completed fortification line along borders of Don-Kuban union with Russia. With such protections in place, our independence is secured.

Having forged close connections with international socialist politicians by subscribing to Totalism and relying on a loyal 'mafia' of sycophantic supporters, Lavrentij Beria has now finally gathered the strength to challenge Filipp Makharadze for the party's leadership. Will he succeed?
Beria takes full control of the government!
We shall create Trancaucasian socialist republic !
We shall unite Caucasus while promoting Syndicalism beyond!
Georgia shall lead the way to a liberated Caucasus!
Bah, forget this. Totalism in one country!

The chaotic upheavels in the Caucasus during the 1920s have meant that displaced populations are common in all three of the states.  Georgia contains large ethnic Russian, Armenian, Turkish and Azeri minorities, and Georgians are found in enclaves throughout the Caucasian states.  This situation could be used to our advantage: we have a ready supply of hostages, and I am that, with a little pressure, their relatives abroad would be willing to serve the interests of Pancaucasian socialism.
Yes, but only exert pressure on Caucasians
column13: Да, но оказать давление только на кавказцев

column2: We must use this to gain influence and information wherever we can
Spread peaceful propaganda through these informal familial channels
column13: Организуйте мирную пропаганду по этим каналам

column2: We shall leave all this alone

Our intelligence agents have uncovered disturbing information about Georgian operations in Azerbaijan: many ethnic Azeris in Georgia have been targeted by the government, so that their relatives in our country will supply them with sensitive information.  This demands a swift reaction!
Watch those with relatives in Georgia, and publicise the issue for full propagandic value
column13: Установить через них связи в Грузии и использовать их для пропаганды

column2: Keep quiet about the whole affair
To threaten ethnic Azeris is a declaration of war on our whole nation!

Our intelligence agents have uncovered disturbing information about Georgian operations in Caucasus: many ethnic Chechens, Ingush and Ossetians in Georgia have been targeted by the government, so that their relatives in our country will supply them with sensitive information.  This demands a swift reaction!
Watch those with relatives in Georgia, and publicise the issue for full propagandic value
column13: Установить через них связи в Грузии и использовать их для пропаганды

column2: Keep quiet about the whole affair
To threaten Mountaineers is a declaration of war on our whole nation!

Our intelligence agents have uncovered disturbing information about Georgian operations in Armenia: many ethnic Armenians in Georgia have been targeted by the government, so that their relatives in our country will supply them with sensitive information.  This demands a swift reaction!
Watch those with relatives in Georgia, and publicise the issue for full propagandic value
column13: Установить через них связи в Грузии и использовать их для пропаганды

column2: Keep quiet about the whole affair
To threaten ethnic Armenians is a declaration of war on our whole nation!

Our intelligence agents have uncovered disturbing information about Georgian operations in the Cossack territories: many ethnic Caucasians and Russians have been targeted by the government, so that their relatives in our country will supply them with sensitive information.  This is not such a grave situation, as no true Cossacks seem to be under threat.
Watch those with relatives in Georgia, and publicise the issue for full propagandic value
column13: Установить через них связи в Грузии и использовать их для пропаганды

column2: Keep quiet about the whole affair
We shall fight to defend the interests of all our peoples!

Our intelligence agents have uncovered disturbing information about Georgian operations in the Empire: many ethnic Turks in Georgia have been targeted by the government, so that their relatives in our country will supply them with sensitive information.  This demands a swift reaction!
Watch those with relatives in Georgia, and publicise the issue for full propagandic value
column13: Установить через них связи в Грузии и использовать их для пропаганды

column2: Keep quiet about the whole affair
To threaten ethnic Turks is a declaration of war on our whole nation!

Our intelligence agents have uncovered disturbing information about Georgian operations in Russia: many ethnic Russians in Georgia have been targeted by the government, so that their relatives in our country will supply them with sensitive information.  This demands a swift reaction!
Watch those with relatives in Georgia, and publicise the issue for full propagandic value
column13: Установить через них связи в Грузии и использовать их для пропаганды

column2: Keep quiet about the whole affair
To threaten ethnic Russians is a declaration of war on our whole nation!

Our intelligence agents have uncovered some interesting information: The Totalists in Tblisi have been spying on a number of bourgeois states in the region, presumably to further their own cause of Syndicalism in the Caucasus. There are a few different ways we can react to this, what shall it be?
To be honest, we have bigger issues to worry about
We can work out an alliance with our comrades to the south!
Our victorious comrades to the north have learned of our espionage work, and have sent us some information that will definitely help our efforts!

Having defeated the old bourgeois Russian state, the Soviets learned of our espionage campaign and want to aid us by allying! There will undoubtedly need to be some debate concerning the lands of the Cossacks, but it would certainly pay off.
Of course! The workers of the world must unite!
We can liberate the Caucasus on our own, thanks

Our espionage operations in the Caucasus have been a great success, and resulted in minimal complications.  We have secured much useful information and additional support and influence.  How should we use this?
column13: Наши разведывательные операции на Кавказе достигли успеха с минимальными потерями. Мы увеличили свое влияние и получили важную информацию. Как мы используем их?

column2: We shall build up our military for the liberation of the Caucasus
We shall encourage immigration to build up Georgian industry
column13: Поддержим иммиграцию, для усиления грузинской промышленности

column2: Armenia used current problems of the Ottoman Empire to break away from its sphere of influence. This present us with an opportunity to launch unification process of the entire Caucasus region, starting with Armenia !
column13: Воспользовавшись беспорядками в Османской империи Армения вышла из ее сферы влияния. Это дает нам уникальный шанс начать объединение Кавказа.

column2: Covert operations will be good enough.

Georgian agitators, together with a detachment of syndicalist emigrants, have fueled popular opinion against the current leadership of our state. Pro-syndicalist parts of our population, together with Georgians in the countryside and in the cities, have rebelled. The country is in chaos, how will the situation develop?
The rebels take over the capital!

Representatives of the newly established syndicalist government of Armenia met with our prime-minister today and announced that Armenia will join family of the Caucasian socialist republics. All of our citizens are celebrating, Georgian intelligence has achieved a new victory!
Merely take control over their new government.
Our attempt to replace the government in Armenia with one loyal to our state has failed miserably. What shall we do now?

Independent state of Azerbaijan is currently without any kind of international protection. This present us with an opportunity to launch unification process of the entire Caucasus region, starting with Azerbaijan !
Covert operations will be good enough.

Georgian agitators, together with a detachment of syndicalist emigrants, have fueled popular opinion against the current leadership of our state. Pro-syndicalist parts of our population, together with Georgians in the countryside and in the cities, have rebelled. The country is in chaos, how will the situation develop?
The rebels take over the capital!

Representatives of the newly established syndicalist government of Azerbaijan met with our prime-minister today and announced that Azerbaijan will join family of the Caucasian socialist republics. All of our citizens are celebrating, Georgian intelligence has achieved a new victory!
Merely take control over their new government.
Our attempt to replace the government in Azerbaijan with one loyal to our state has failed miserably. What shall we do now?
Independent cossack state of Don-Kuban is currently without any kind of international protection. This present us with an opportunity to finalize unification process of the entire Caucasus region !
Covert operations will be good enough.

Georgian agitators, together with a detachment of syndicalist emigrants, have fueled popular opinion against the current leadership of our state. Pro-syndicalist parts of our population, together with Georgians in the countryside and in the cities, have rebelled. The country is in chaos, how will the situation develop?
The rebels take over the capital!

Representatives of the newly established syndicalist government of Don-Kuban union met with our prime-minister today and announced that Don-Kuban union will join family of the Caucasian socialist republics. All of our citizens are celebrating, Georgian intelligence has achieved a new victory!
Merely take control over their new government.
Georgian Coup in the Don Kuban Union Failed
Our attempt to replace the government in Don-Kuban union with one loyal to our state has failed miserably. What shall we do now?

Independent Mountain Republic is currently without any kind of international protection. This present us with an opportunity to continue with our plan to bring syndicalism to the entire Caucasus region !
Covert operations will be good enough.

Georgian agitators, together with a detachment of syndicalist emigrants, have fueled popular opinion against the current leadership of our state. Pro-syndicalist parts of our population, together with Georgians in the countryside and in the cities, have rebelled. The country is in chaos, how will the situation develop?
The rebels take over the capital!

Representatives of the newly established syndicalist government of Mountain Republic met with our prime-minister today and announced that Mountain Republic will join family of the Caucasian socialist republics. All of our citizens are celebrating, Georgian intelligence has achieved a new victory!
Merely take control over their new government.
Our attempt to replace the government in Mountain Republic with one loyal to our state has failed miserably. What shall we do now?
After a long fight with Armenian, we have launched a full offensive and forced the Armenian Armed forces to surrender. Yerevan is now in our hands!
column13: После долгой войны с Арменией, крупномасштабное наступление вынудило армян капитулировать. Ереван теперь в наших руках!

column2: After a long fight with Azerbaijan, we have launched a full offensive and forced the Azerbaijanian armed forces to surrender. Baku is now in our hands!
column13: После долгой войны с Азербайджаном, крупномасштабное наступление вынудило азербайджанцев капитулировать. Баку теперь в наших руках!

column2: After a long fight with the Don-Kuban Union, we have launched a full offensive and forced their armed forces to surrender. Yekaterinodar is now in our hands!
column13: После долгой войны с Доно-Кубанского Союза, крупномасштабное наступление вынудило казаков капитулировать. Екатеринодар теперь в наших руках!

column2: The Fate of the Northern Caucasus
After a long fight with armed forces of the Northern Caucasus state, we have launched a full offensive and forced their armed forces to surrender. Grozny is now in our hands!
Areas of the rebellious state of Azerbaijan are now firmly integrated into our growing state.
column13: Территории мятежного государства Азербайджан полностью интегрированы в нашу страну.

column2: Areas of the rebellious state of Armenia are now firmly integrated into our growing state.
column13: Территории мятежного государства Армения полностью интегрированы в нашу страну.

column2: Areas of the former cossacks state are now firmly integrated into our growing state.
column13: Территории бывшего казацкого государства полностью интегрированы в нашу страну.

column2: Integration of Mountainous Republic of the Northern Caucasus
Areas of the former Mountainous Republic of the Northern Caucasus are now firmly integrated into our growing state.

Due to the Berlin Stock Crisis and internal market problems a lot of our economists suggest reducing the investments. The critics of our economical policy are worried about the huge costs of rapid industrialization and development of infrastructure. According to them, we could redirect some money to social projects from which citizens of our state could greatly benefit.

The unavailability of many goods is causing a lot of anger in many communities in Georgia. Workers, farmers and the intelligentsia are becoming unhappier with every passing day as they have to stand in long queues for basic goods. The hardliners are insisting on increasing the activities of the secret police while liberals propose soothing the newly introduced Totalist policies.
The secret police must be more active!
The Social Democratic Party and National Democratic Party are Re-established

Our policy has alienated a lot of students and young professionals. Together with disgraced conservatives and morally bankrupt social democrat politicians they began to recreate the former major parties. Both of freshly revived parties demand resignation of Beria and dissolution of the secret police. This is clearly a dangerous threat to our rule.
Break up these bourgeois parties with force!

The last debates in parliament were supposed to go quickly and quietly, as usual. Instead we got several motions from licensed opposition parties and speeches calling the peoples of Georgia to resist the government. Their leaders decided to be independent from us as we recently have lost a lot of support from the nation and all classes. Even within the ranks of our party there is hardly hidden anger. The situation looks very bleak.
Dissolve the parliament! Let Comrade Mauser have the floor!
Stand firm on our policies and wait out these polemics!

Our strategy has failed. Georgia is in a state of actual civil war, as people demand the immediate resignation of the whole incumbent cabinet, including the Supreme Economical Council with Beria, and the reintroducing of democratic liberties. We can't trust the army as many of soldiers and NCOs sympathize with protesters or have plans for military takeover. Who is going to have the last word?
The opposition is too divided to overthrow the Totalists!

The Supreme Economical Council is debating about liberalization of economical policies. Beria is rather against major changes but even he has to deal with serious the discontent in Georgia, even among socialists and communists. The Berlin Stock Crisis and problems of our neighbours have left our economy in bad state.
The opposition comes peacefully to power!
The Goals of the First Year Plan Have Been Achieved

Workers, farmers and the intelligentsia of our state have achieved enormous economical success. The output from mines and factories, the crops are surprisingly high. Thanks to this we have built several factories and rail-roads which are going to serve our Socialist Fatherland.
Foreign Policy of the Georgian Kingdom

We have to choose the general path of our foreign policy. There are several directions we can pursue: Alliance either with Russia or Germany, proactive foreign policy or isolationism. Every option has a lot of supporters in our country and can lead to unknown outcome. We, as an insignificant state on the world stage, are for once free to choose our own path.
We will go our own way
Isolationism is not only the best way, it's the only way.
Foreign Policy of the Georgian Republic

We have to choose the general path of our foreign policy. There are several directions we can pursue: Alliance either with Russia or Germany, proactive foreign policy or isolationism. Every option has a lot of supporters in our country and can lead to unknown outcome. We, as an insignificant state on the world stage, are for once free to choose our own path.
We will go our own way
Our Georgian brothers have announced that they seek to create an alliance with Russia. This can push further our plans and bring the stability in the Caucasus.
We pursue the path of neutrality, so no
How about a non-aggression pact instead?
The Georgian-Russian Alliance becomes a reality!

After short negotiations our governments have agreed on Georgian-Russian alliance and mutual economical agreements, which will bring our countries closer together. While this alignment has many opponents, fearing the possibility of Russian domination over Georgians, it's going to bring Georgia long yearned stability and prosperity.
Russians refuse to ally with us

In rather unexpected response, Russians have discarded the idea of Russian-Georgian alliance. This move bankrupted the credibility of Russian alignment. Now we have to search for other partners in this dangerous world or isolate ourselves from it...

Not many people believed that non-communist Georgia will turn to Germany for support. Even less people believed that Georgians would ask us to join Mitteleuropa. Many Caucasus-specialists and foreign policy advise rejecting the Georgian entry, as whole of Caucasus is highly unstable. Another major concern is the opinion of Russian government, which one day could start a war to conquer Georgia. Are we going to push our alliance eastwards?
The whole of the Caucasus is not worth the bones of a single Pomeranian grenadier
The whole of the Caucasus is not worth the bones of a single Pomeranian grenadier
Our Foreign Ministry hadn't thought that Germans would agree to extend Mitteleuropa eastwards. With admission to German-led alliance we have finally rejoined Europa.
Germans refuse to allow us into Mitteleuropa
Both Chancellor and Kaiser himself refused to admit us into Mitteleuropa. Now we have to search for other partners in this dangerous world or isolate ourselves from it...

In rather suprising move, Russian government suggested a non-aggression pact instead of alliance. While the government and public opinion is surprised with this proposition, the experts and advisers to PM suggest taking this offer. Russia seems to have other plans towards the region and perhaps we have to buy ourselves time.
End the negotiations and declare neutrality
Our Georgian brothers have announced that they seek to create an alliance with Russia. This can push further our plans and bring the stability in the Caucasus.
The Georgian-Armenian Alliance becomes a reality!
And together we shall secure the Caucasus liberty and progress!
Armenia refuse to ally with us

The nation is currently voting. There are only two major parties which can get sufficient number of mandates to form a government - the conservative National Party and the Social Democratic Mensheviks. Who shall win?
His majesty and the army dissolve the chaos of democracy!

The nation is currently voting. There are only two major parties which can get sufficient number of mandates to form a government - the conservative National Party and socialdemocratic Mensheviks. Who shall win?
His majesty and the army dissolve the chaos of democracy!

The nation is currently voting. There are only two major parties which can get sufficient number of mandates to form a government - the conservative National Party and socialdemocratic Mensheviks. Who shall win?
His majesty and the army dissolve the chaos of democracy!

The nation is currently voting. There are only two major parties which can get sufficient number of mandates to form a government - the conservative National Party and socialdemocratic Mensheviks. Who shall win?
His majesty and the army dissolve the chaos of democracy!

The nation is currently voting. There are only two major parties which can get sufficient number of mandates to form a government - the conservative National Party and socialdemocratic Mensheviks. Who shall win?
His majesty and the army dissolve the chaos of democracy!

The nation is currently voting. There are only two major parties which can get sufficient number of mandates to form a government - the conservative National Party and socialdemocratic Mensheviks. Who shall win?
His majesty and the army dissolve the chaos of democracy!

His Majesty has decided to appoint a Prime Minister. The liberal and reactionary wings of the army and the court have chosen two candidates, Mikhail von Tsereteli, a famous historian is the representative of the reactionaries whilst Ivane Javakshivili, a conservative-liberal is the rector of University of Tblisi.
A New Head of the Council of Ministers?

His Majesty decided to choose a Prime Minister. The liberal and reactionary wings of Army and Court have chosen two candidates - Mikhail von Tsereteli, famous antiquity historian, the representative of reactionaries and Ivane Javakshivili, a conservative-liberal rector of University of Tblisi. A third candidate with support only from the army, is the tough soldier Shalva Maglakelidze.
A New Economical Policy for Georgia

The fall of Bolshevism in Georgia has left us with many economical problems. The economists, politicians, aristocrats and common people demand quick and painless solution. It's obvious however that both laissez-faire economists and supporters of government-controlled economy can't claim having visible majority in society. Something however must be done about former state-controlled factories, kolkhozes and developed social security system. We have to choose an option and keep our fingers crossed.
A New Economical Policy for Georgia

The fall of Bolshevism in Georgia has left us with many economical problems. The economists, politicians, aristocrats and common people demand quick and painless solution. It's obvious however that both laisez-faires economists and supporters of government-controlled economy can't claim having visible majority in society. Something however must be done about former state-controlled factories, kolkhozes and developed social security system. We have to choose an option and keep our fingers crossed.
A balanced approach is the best course of action.
The government should control the economy!

The trust in the republic has fallen so low that after endless scandals and bickering between cliques, the army together with monarchists is trying to install an absolute monarchy. It's our darkest hour - we can either defend democracy or approve the absolute monarchy
I for one welcome our new overlord

The hastily created Council of Electors, compromised of generals, Orthodox bishops and aristocrats is debating on choice of monarch. A nation of a myriad of noble houses, only a few aristocrats rise above the common mire.
Republicans are trying to overthrow the monarchy. Now we should decide whether or not Georgia should become a Republic once more or if the autocracy should have one more chance.

It's time to attack Armenians and liberate Borchato district. For too long we have tolerated the Armenian rule over our sacred lands. With this campaign we will not only reunite these lands with Georgia but subjugate whole Armenia!
War against Mountainous Republic of the Northern Caucasus?
The Republic of the Northern Caucasus should be the next target of our campaign. Every Georgian agrees on war against these uncivilized peoples. Their country must be eradicated!

Azerbaijan is in control of Zaquatala district, which should return to it's Georgian fatherland. First Georgian Republic hadn't solved that dispute, we have now a chance to end the suffering of Georgians in Azerbaijan!
The Cossacks hate our state and they are likely to attack us to take back everything we conquered. We must strike them first, before they attack us!
The Future of the Transcaucasian Socialist Republic

The collapse of Socialism in our country has left the politicians with one question - should be the Transcaucasian Republic be preserved? Some politicians point to the disappointment of the general population with current system. Both supporters and opponents of Transcaucasian one state don't have majority and dissolution or preservation of the Union are possible. It's one of the major decisions which needs to be undertaken by the new state.
The Transcaucasian Socialist Republic is dissolved
The Collapse of the Transcaucasian Socialist Republic
Due to the proclamation of the restored monarchy in Georgia, the politicians from other parts of the former TSR declared the independence of their states. We should have taken another path!
A New Union for the Caucasus

We have achieved what we wanted. The Georgian army has defeated every enemy and we dominate the Caucasus. Now, together with pro-Georgian politicians from the conquered states, we should create the greatest state which has ever existed in the Caucasus!
The Treaty of the Transcaucasian Federation is signed today!
The Treaty of the Transcaucasian Commonwealth is signed today!
A New Order in the Caucasus
We have achieved what we wanted. The Georgian army has defeated every enemy and we dominate the Caucasus. Now we shall create Greater Georgia which will last thousand years!

With the rebirth of the Mountainous Republic of the Northern Caucasus we must decide where our capital should be. Historically the capitals of MRNC were Nazran, Vladikavkaz and Temir-Khan-Shura but Grozny could be used as well. Which city shall have an honor to become our capital ?

Industry of the Mountainous Republic of North Caucasia have long time been very small and unefficient, and it went even more down after occupation of our state by Cossacks in 1926. In order to remedy this we must revitalize our existing industry with new machinery and create new industrial complexes. However only way how to obtain this is via foreign investments of friendly powers, if their situation will allow it.....

Industry of the Mountainous Republic of North Caucasia have long time been very small and unefficient, and it went even more down after occupation of our state by Cossacks in 1926. In order to remedy this we must revitalize our existing industry with new machinery and create new industrial complexes. However only way how to obtain this is via foreign investments of friendly powers, if their situation will allow it.....

The government of Mountainous Republic of the Northern Caucasus has asked us to help them in their industrialization process, which will allow MRNC to survive in this belligerent world, in return for surpluses of raw material and increase of our influence on the Northern Caucasus. Shall we assist them with this task ?

The government of Mountainous Republic of the Northern Caucasus has asked us to help them in their industrialization process, which will allow MRNC to survive in this belligerent world, in return for surpluses of raw material and increase of our influence on the Northern Caucasus. Shall we assist them with this task ?

Foreign technical specialists, joined by the our diligent workers, have allowed us to improve our obsolete industrial sector. This will definitively strengthen relations with our foreign friends and help our country to survive in these turbulent times.

Despite our best efforts, our current authoritarian form of government is causing rising discontent among the population of our republic. They are not content with existing dictatorship and demand that democratic and liberal reforms be implemented in MRNc. What shall we do ?

Our geologists report that new oil field has been found in southeastern part of our state near Grozny. Hovewer in order to fully exploit new oil deposits, state intervention in form of financial and fiscal support is required, otherwise our small private sector will be unable to fund expansion of oil deposits. Shall we support expansion of oil fields via financial and fiscal support or leave our underdeveloped privite sector to fund it ?

After several months of preparations the provisional government has completed the arrangements for the first free election in MRNC ever. There are 45 seats in Central Committee of the Northern Caucasus available and various political parties have begun their campaigns. Currently only three parties have a chance of gaining a majority, thus forming a new government. Which one shall prevail ?
The army shall put an end to this chaotic democracy !

The time has come to elect a new president. All major forces in the country have put forward their candidates and the Central Committee of the Northern Caucasus is ready to assemble to vote on the new president.
Ali Mitayev, the People`s Party representative!
Sayd Shamyl, the Agrarian Union representative!
Tapa Tchermoeff, the Nationalist party representative!
Shaykh Uzun-Hadji, the Nationalist party representative!
Gapor Akhriyev, the people's tribune of our time!

According to the Constitution elections are to be held every four years. Term of the Central Committee of the Northern Caucasus has expired and the time has come to elect a new members of Central Comittee. There are 45 seats in Central Committee of the Northern Caucasus available and various political parties have begun their campaigns. Currently only three parties have a chance of gaining a majority, thus forming a new government. Which one shall prevail ?
The army shall put an end to this chaotic democracy !

The time has come to elect a new president. All major forces in the country have put forward their candidates and the Central Committee of the Northern Caucasus is ready to assemble to vote on the new president.
Ali Mitayev, the People`s Party representative!
Sayd Shamyl, the Agrarian Union representative!
Tapa Tchermoeff, the Nationalist party representative!
Shaykh Uzun-Hadji, the Nationalist party representative!
Gapor Akhriyev, the people's tribune of our time!

According to the Constitution elections are to be held every four years. Term of the Central Committee of the Northern Caucasus has expired and the time has come to elect a new members of Central Comittee. There are 45 seats in Central Committee of the Northern Caucasus available and various political parties have begun their campaigns. Currently only three parties have a chance of gaining a majority, thus forming a new government. Which one shall prevail ?

Ali Mitayev, the People`s Party representative!
Sayd Shamyl, the Agrarian Union representative!
Tapa Tchermoeff, the Nationalist party representative!
Shaykh Uzun-Hadji, the Nationalist party representative!
Gapor Akhriyev, the people's tribune of our time!
Our beloved president Tapa Tchermoeff, hero of the struggle for independence, died today at the age of 66 years. Shaykh Uzun-Hadji, will succeed in position of president of our nation.
A state funeral is least we can do....

The former President, Tapa Tchermoeff, hero of the struggle for independence, died today at the age of 66 years. The grand state funeral has been organized to remeber his great deeds for all nations of Caucasus.
A state funeral is least we can do....

Existing dictatorial government of MRNC was proved incapable by their inability to solve widespread riots, which threatened to tear fragile MRNC apart. In order to save unity of country and its independence, armed forces with support of liberal political circles have staged a coup, which was succesfull. With dissolvement of dictatorship the field is open for various possiblities of political change in MRNC including the declaration of a republic, if armed forces allows it.
Let them operate - they could be useful

column2: Following the growth of politicised orthodoxy in Russia, our ethnic Russian peasants have begun forming into politicised congregations in the countryside, demanding to overturn the domination of the Cossacks and establish a peaceful religious state!
column13: Вслед за политизированием православия в России, наши этнические русские крестьяне начали формировать политизированные общины в деревнях. Они требуют отменить господтство казаков и установить мирное теократическое государство!

column2: Cossack domination is wrong - we shall give them a role in government
column13: Дать им места в правительстве, для предотвращения дальнейших беспорядков

column2: Damn this Russian meddling!  We shall attack the source!
column13: Это Россия вмешивается в наши дела! Мы должны уничтожить источник!

column2: Don-Kuban Union outlaws the Religious Populists
column13: Доно-Кубанский Союз поставил вне закона религиозные организации

column2: In the Don-Kuban Union, Faith and Nation have been predominantly working through loosely organised networks of religious populists amongst the oppressed peasant classes.  The paranoid Cossacks will allow no opposition to their authority, and have forcibly disbanded all of these groups!
The Cossacks are our brothers too, and we will not oppose them
column13: Казаки - наши братья, мы не будем им противостоять

column2: Our protection extends over all Orthodox peoples
column13: Заявить о нашей защите всех православных!

column2: Don-Kuban Union allows the Religious Populists to operate
column13: Доно-Кубанский Союз позволяет работать религиозным народникам

column2: In the Don-Kuban Union, Faith and Nation have been predominantly working through loosely organised networks of religious populists amongst the oppressed peasant classes.  The Cossacks see these pacifistic groups as no threat to their militarised state.
column13: В Доно-Кубанском Союзе 'Вера и Нация' работает в основном через слабо организованную сеть проповедников. Казаки поняли, что эти группы не причиняют вреда их милитаризированному государству.

column2: All is now well in the Don and the Kuban
column13: Теперь все хорошо на Дону и Кубани

column2: Announce our friendship with Don-Kuban Union
column13: Заявить о нашей дружбе с казаками

column2: Our Cossack masters have realised that their dictatorial rule is against the will both of the people and of God, and we have secured a powerful voice in the Government of the Don-Kuban Union!Russian organisations were instrumental in bringing us to power, but should we continue our good relations with them now?
Of course, we shall propose an alliance with Russia!
Announce our friendship, and nothing more
column13: Известить о нашей дружбе, не более

column2: The Religious Populists Continue their Movement!

The situation in the countryside is getting out of hand!  The Religious Populists are organising and promoting demonstrations on a daily basis, calling for the ending of Cossack privileges and the establishment of a new state based on religious principles.  This has been tied to a large recent influx of Russian monks into our villages - things could turn ugly!
This has gone too far - we will now ban them!
column13: Все это зашло слишком далеко, мы должны запретить их!

column2: The Government collapses and the Religious Populists takes control!
column13: Правительство пало, и Религиозные народники приходят к власти!

column2: We shall teach all Russians not to meddle in Cossack affairs!
column13: Мы научим русских не вмешиваться в казачьи дела!

column2: We have to stop interfering in the Cossack territories
column13: Мы должны прекратить вмешиваться в дела казаков

column2: Announce our protection over the Orthodox
column13: Заявить о нашей защите всех православных!

column2: We shall end Cossack brutality ourselves!
Religious Populist Don-Kuban Union proposes an alliance!
The new Religious Populist government installed in the Don-Kuban Union has offered to cement the spiritual ties of all Orthodox nations with a permanent military alliance.
column13: Новое религиозное правительство Доно-Кубанского союза предложило закрепить духовные связи всех православных стран военным союзом.

column2: Of course - all the Faithful shall fight together!
column13: Конечно, все верующие будут бороться вместе!

column2: We are sorry, this cannot be
Never - all the Orthodox must be ruled by Russia!
column13: Никогда, все православные должны быть под властью России!

column2: Georgia is an atheist state, but we have never been able to stamp out all clandestine religious organisations.  Following the growth of politicised orthodoxy in Russia, these groups have begun to develop political organisations of their own, aiming to destroy Caucasian Socialism and reinstall an independant Georgian Monarchy!
Arrest them all and interrogate their leaders
Let them act, but keep them under surveillance
column13: Пусть действуют, но держать их под контролем

column2: Perhaps Georgian Christianity and Socialism are not incompatible...
column13: Возможно христианство и социализм не являются несовместимыми вещами...

column2: The source of this is Russia, and we shall destroy it!
column13: Это все происки России, мы должны уничтожить ее!

column2: In Georgia, Faith and Nation have been predominantly working through the existing clandestine religious congregations, which are now united behind the creation of a religious monarchy in their country.  However, the Georgian atheists have seen them as a threat to their demented aims to create a collective society, and have thrown the leaders into prison, to be suffer unspeakable tortures at the hands of the Georgian secret services!
The state of the Georgian Church is no business of ours
column13: Судьба грузинской церкви нас не интересует

column2: Announce our protection over the Orthodox
column13: Заявить о нашей защите всех православных!

column2: Continue to give them our support

In Georgia, Faith and Nation have been predominantly working through the existing clandestine religious congregations, which are now united behind the creation of a religious monarchy in their country.  Suprisingly, the Georgian atheists have not seen them as a threat to their demented aims to create a collective society, and have allowed them to continue their operations!

column13: Заявить о нашей дружбе с Грузией

column2: Encourage the Georgian Monarchists to step up their operations
column13: Вдохновить грузинских монархистов на следующий шаг

column2: The Restoration of the Georgian Monarchy!

After many centuries of alien rule, Georgia is a great Orthodox Monarchy once more! Russia has been inspirational as a model and a guide in this process, but can we forget our time as a Russian colony?
column13: После столетий правления чужаков, Грузия вновь стала православной монархией! Россия стала вдохновительницей этого процесса, но сможем ли мы забыть время, когда были российской колонией?

column2: Announce our friendship, and nothing more
column13: Известить о нашей дружбе, не более

column2: The Monarchists Step Up Their Activity!

The situation in the countryside is getting out of hand!  The Monarchists are organising and promoting demonstrations on a daily basis, and calling for the dissolution of our current government and the establishment of a new government in tune with religious principles.  This has been tied to a large recent influx of Russian monks into our monasteries - things could turn ugly!
This has gone too far - we will now destroy them all!
column13: Это зашло слишком далеко, разгромим их всех!

column2: The Government collapses and the Monarchists take control!
How dare the Russians meddle in our affairs!  Attack!
column13: Как Россия смеет вмешиваться в наши дела, атаковать их!

column2: The Georgians have resisted the demands of the Monarchists for a radical political and religious reformation of their country, and are breaking up the local political institutions and sending in the Secret Police!  All Russian monks have also been expelled from the country, and those that have returned are calling for immediate action to defend Orthodoxy in Greece!
We must stop our interference in Georgia
column13: Мы должны прекратить вмешательство в грузинские дела

column2: Announce our protection over the Orthodox
column13: Заявить о нашей защите всех православных!

column2: We shall destroy these Georgian atheists!
The new Monarchist government installed in Georgia has offered to cement the spiritual ties of all Orthodox nations with a permanent military alliance.
column13: Новое грузинское правительство предлагает закрепить духовную связь всех православных народов военным союзом.

column2: Of course - all the Faithful shall fight together!
column13: Конечно, все верующие будут бороться вместе!

column2: We are sorry, this cannot be
No - Georgia's rightful monarch is the Tsar of Russia!
column13: Нет, законный грузинский монарх - русский царь!

column2: The crisis in Russia has reached a frightening level of intensity: once more, Red and White forces are at war.  We have seen the horrors of Bolshevism once before, and though our own workers may not like it, it is probably in our best interests to help the legitimate Russian government.
The Finns send us significant number of volunteers and military material that will help us considerably in our struggle against dangerous bolshevik menace threatening to rip apart Russia !
column13: Финны прислали нам значительное число военного снаряжения. Также прибыло много финнских добровольцев, желающих сражаться против большевиков!

column2: The Russian government has proved itself unable to maintain the security in Karelia.  We have received word that many local leaders want to secede and join Finland ! We will surely be welcomed by the Karelian population very easily, but we could also move to take the port of Murmansk, although the risk of this would be greater.
No, we must ally with Russia against the Bolshevik threat
column13: Нет, мы должны помочь русским в их борьбе с большевизмом

column2: Karelia can provide its own security...
column13: Карелия сама может обеспечить себе безопасность

column2: The Finns have taken claimed authority over our Karelian provinces, but have guaranteed our sovereignty over Murmansk.  How should we react?
column13: Финны потребовали передачи Карелии, но гарантировали наш сувернитет над Мурманском. Как мы отреагируем?

column2: At least we still hold Lapland...
column13: По-крайней мере, Кольский полуостров все еще наш

column2: The Finns, using ongoing civil war have taken claimed authority over Karelian provinces, but have guaranteed Russian sovereignty over Murmansk.  How should we react to this act of capitalist agression ?
There is nothing we can do...
The Finns have claimed authority over our Karelian provinces, and have occupied Murmansk and the provinces on the White Sea.  How should we react?
column13: Финны потребовали передачи Карелии, а также Мурманск и Кольский полуостров. Как мы отреагируем?

column2: Winning the Civil War is more important than Karelia or Lapland...
column13: Победа в гражданской войне важнее Карелии.

column2: The Finns Wont Get an Inch!
The Finns have claimed authority over Karelian provinces, and have occupied Murmansk and the provinces on the White Sea.  How should we react to this act of capitalist agression ?
Winning the Civil War is more important than Karelia or Lapland...
column13: Победа в гражданской войне важнее Карелии.

column2: The Finns Wont Get an Inch!
We've been beaten by the Finns, how did this happen? They've seized the whole White Sea Tundra!
column13: Мы проиграли финнам, они захватили все побережье Белого моря!

column2: Offer peace treaty, recognize Finish teritorial gains
column13: Подписать договор и признать новые границы

column2: No, the war will continue until our army marches through Helsinki!
column13: Нет, война будет продолжаться пока мы не возьмем  Хельсинки!

column2: We've been beaten by the Finns, how did this happen? They've seized the whole White Sea Tundra!
column13: Мы проиграли финнам, они захватили все побережье Белого моря!

column2: Offer peace treaty, recognize Finish teritorial gains
column13: Подписать договор и признать новые границы

column2: No, the war will continue until we march through Helsinki!
column13: Нет, война будет продолжаться пока мы не возьмем  Хельсинки!

column2: We've succesfully beaten rusian army and conquered whole White Sea Tundra. Now humiliated russian leadership offers us peace in which they promise to recognize our teritorial gains and withdrawn from disputed teritory. How shall we react ?
column13: Мы разбили русскую армию и заняли побережье Белого моря. Русское правительство прелагает заключить мир в обмен на признание наших территориальных претензий.

column2: Accept proposal , this is more than we hoped !
No, the war will continue until our army marches through Petrograd!
column13: Война будет продолжаться, пока мы не дойдем до Петрограда!

column2: According to the Treaty of Archangelsk we must withdraw our force from remaining parts of the White Sea Tundra and Lapland...
column13: По Архангельскому договору мы должны передать большую часть побережья Белого моря.

column2: Finland refused to sign peace treaty!
Finland refused our generous peace offer and renewed military actions....
column13: Финляндия отказалась принять наше щедрое предложение и возобновила военные действия.

column2: The Finns wish to help us more directly with our Civil War against the Communard Bastards. They have asked to form an alliance with us until we can destroy Soviet Russia once and for all.
column13: Финны предлагают помочь нам победить большевиков. Они предложили нам союз, теперь мы сможем разгромить Советы раз и навсегда!

column2: The Finns are no better than The Soviet Devil!

Now that the Russian Civil War is over, there has been a debate in Finland whether the Alliance should be ratified or we if we can trust the Russians. The alliance has served its original purpose, The Soviets have been beaten once again.
column13: После того, как Гражданской война в России закончилась, встал вопрос, нужен ли союз с русскими. Союз выполнил свою цель - большевики быль вновь разгромлены.

column2: Keep the alliance with our neighbors

Now that the Russian Civil War is over, there has been a debate in Finland whether the Alliance should be ratified or we if we can trust the Russians. The alliance has served its original purpose, The Soviets have been beaten once again.
column13: После того, как Гражданской война в России закончилась, встал вопрос, нужен ли союз с русскими. Союз выполнил свою цель - большевики быль вновь разгромлены.

column2: Keep the alliance with our neighbors
Russia has fallen from internal weakness and Civil War. Now, Soviet Russia is our new neighbor.
column13: Белая Россия пала в Гражданской войне. Советская Россия - наш новый сосед.

column2: Ask the Soviets for a Peace Treaty...
We won't give the Bolsheviks a minutes rest!
column13: Мы не дадим большевикам ни минуты покоя!

column2: The treacherous White Finns have asked for peace. They worked together with the White Russians to try and stop the revolution from taking place and now they are afraid, we can smell it.
column13: Белофинны просят мира. Они помогали белым останавить дело революции. Как мы отреагируем?

column2: We have more threats at home that we have to take care of first...
column13: У нас еще много разных угроз в стране, нам не до финнов...

column2: We will liberate the Finnish working class and destroy the white Finns!
With their territory overrun by enemy advances, Russian forces have been pushed deep west. We could use the chance to occupy the key port of Murmansk and nearby areas.

With our territory overrun by enemy advances, the northern city of Murmansk has become a safe haven for our forces, far from the frontlines and secure enough for our government. However, the treacherous Finns have amasse troops on the borders and are preparing to seize this important area from us!
This is hopeless, surrender the area to the Finns
We've been beaten by the Siberians, how did this happen? They've seized large part of the Western Siberia!

column2: The weak, corrupt and oppressive Russian government, that emerged after the Civil war was unable to rule the country effectively and now the Russia workers have risen up against tiranny, hoping to create a more just and free society. We should help the Russian workers as good as we can.
The syndicates of America send us significant number of volunteers and military material that will help us considerably in our struggle against decadent russian government !
column13: Наши американские товарищи прислали нам значительное число военного снаряжения. Также прибыло много американских добровольцев, желающих сражаться за дело интернациональной пролетарской солидарности!

column2: The workers of Russia, led by the Bolshevics, have risen once more in an attempt to throw down the ineffective Russian government. We ourselves have experienced a bloody struggle for freedom, perhaps we should help the Russians to succeed as well?
column13: Рабочие России, во главе с большевиками, вновь встали на борьбу. Мы сами боролись за свободу, может стоит помочь русским достигнуть успеха?

column2: The End of the Russian civil war
For good or ill, the Russian civil war is now over.  The General Staff have reported that they learnt many valuable lessons regarding the nature of modern warfare over the course of the conflict.
column13: К добру или к худу, война в России закончена. Генеральный штаб сообщает, что война позволила нам получить множество ценных уроков по ведению современной войны.

column2: The End of the Russian civil war
For good or ill, the Russian civil war is now over.  The General Staff have reported that they learnt many valuable lessons regarding the nature of modern warfare over the course of the conflict.
column13: К добру или к худу, война в России закончена. Генеральный штаб сообщает, что война позволила нам получить множество ценных уроков по ведению современной войны.
