column2: Our minister of armament has proposed to organise a national support programme for our scientists. Even though many mundane people consider this a waste of funds, it is believed that further empirical research may lead to interesting results.
column13: Наш министр военной промышленности предложил организовать национальную программу поддержки наших ученых. Даже при том, что обычные люди считают это пустой тратой денег, он полагает, что дальнейшие эмпирические исследования могут привести к интересным результатам.
Инвестировать в химию и ракетную технику

column2: Invest into both fields of research

A group of scholars has proposed to organise a national support programme for our scientists. Even though many mundane people consider this a waste of funds, it is believed that further empirical research may lead to interesting results.
column13: Группа ученых предложила организовать национальную программу поддержки наших ученых. Даже при том, что обычные люди считают это пустой тратой денег, они полагают, что дальнейшие эмпирические исследования могут привести к интересным результатам.
Инвестировать в химию и ракетную технику

column2: Invest into both fields of research

Recent naval manoeuvres have led us to one conclusion: the Russian navy is a mess! Sweeping reforms are needed if we are to dominate seas once more. Each of our top admirals have come up with a plan. Their proposals await the government's consultation.
column13: Недавние военно-морские маневры привели нас к единственному заключению: российский флот - небоеспособен! Нужны радикальные реформы, если мы хотим править морями. Наши лучшие адмиралы разработали разные планы. Они ждут вашего решения.

column2: Robert von Wirйn - Large open seas fleet
column13: Роберт фон Вирен - большой флот открытого моря

column2: Ivan Bosrem- Submarines and fast raider ships
column13: Иван Бострем - подлодки и быстрые рейдерские суда

column2: Mikhail Berens- Carriers are the wave of future
column13: Михаил Беренс - авианосцы путь к будущему

column2: In the Peace Treaty we agreed to war reparation to the victor and so here are the spoils!
column13: По мирному договору мы должны выплачивать военные репарации.

column2: To the victor go the spoils!
In the Peace Treaty we agreed to war reparation from the conquered and so here are the spoils!
column13: По мирному договору мы получили военные репарации.

column2: To the victor go the spoils!
In the Peace Treaty we agreed to war reparation to the victor and so here are the spoils!
column13: По мирному договору мы должны выплачивать военные репарации.

column2: To the victor go the spoils!
In the Peace Treaty we agreed to war reparation from the conquered and so here are the spoils!
column13: По мирному договору мы получили военные репарации.

column2: To the victor go the spoils!

The Russian navy is currently many years behind the other major states in terms of naval power. One way to improve the abysmal status of the Russian navy is a drastic modernisation program during which our largest warships will be completely overhauled.
column13: В настоящее время, русский флот по мощи сильно отстает от других крупных государств. Один из способов, как улучшить отвратительное состояние флота, это запуск программы модернизации в течение которой наши крупнейшие военные корабли будут полностью переоборудованы

column2: Those ships are useless, scrap them!
The general overhaul of our obsolete cruisers was successfully finished and the ships are ready to enter the service of the Russian navy.
column13: Капитальный ремонт устаревших крейсеров был успешно завершен и корабли снова готовы поступить на служить русскому флоту.

column2: The general overhaul of our obsolete battleships was successfully finished and the ships are ready to enter the service of the Russian navy.
column13: Капитальный ремонт устаревших броненосцев был успешно завершен и корабли снова готовы поступить на служить русскому флоту.

column2: The Tsar Alexander University in Petrograd had the honour of hosting the important British statesman Winston Churchill. In his speech to the attending students he praised the great sacrifices the Russian nation has made in order to liberate the continent from the draconian rule of Germany and to keep it safe from the clutches of Syndicalism. He warned Russia to alway remain vigilant against the Syndicalist menace, which divides the entire continent behind a so-called Iron Curtain.
It has been 25 years since his imperial majesty Vladmir I Romanov became the tsar and autocrat of Russia. It is time for the entire nation to celebrate this grand jubilee.
column13: Прошло 25 лет с того момента, как Его Императорское Величество Владимир I Романов стал российским самодержцем. Народ празднует великую годовщину.

column2: With revolutionary movements active throughout Russia some members of the Duma are suggesting that it is time for a complete reorganization of the internal police on the basis of the old Tsarist secret police, Okhrana, to maintain law and order in Russia. This organization will hunt down any radical revolutionary elements and 're-educate' them to respect the Russian state!
The current state of our internal police is sufficient.
A new Chairman of the Committee of Ministers?
Now that the Autocracy is restored Tsar Kyrill has taken it upon himself to name the new head of the Committee of Ministers and form a new government.
column13: После восстановления самодержавия император Кирилл должен назвать имя нового председателя кабинета министров и сформировать новое правительство.

column2: The chief of the reactionary landowners, Vladimir Purishkevich!
The moderate military man, Anton Denikin!
Felix Yusupov, the dilettantish centre of the Petrograd social scene!
A new Chairman of the Committee of Ministers?
Now that the Autocracy is restored Tsar Dmitri has taken it upon himself to name the new head of the Committee of Ministers and form a new government.
column13: После восстановления самодержавия император Дмитрий должен назвать имя нового председателя кабинета министров и сформировать новое правительство.

column2: The chief of the reactionary landowners, Vladimir Purishkevich!
The moderate military man, Anton Denikin!
Felix Yusupov, the dilettantish centre of the Petrograd social scene!
Compromise with Wrangel and let him rule.
A new Chairman of the Committee of Ministers ?
Now that Wrangel is Tsar he has decided to name the new head of the Committee of Ministers and form a new government.
column13: После того как Врангель стал императором, он должен назвать имя нового председателя кабинета министров и сформировать новое правительство.

column2: The chief of the reactionary landowners, Vladimir Purishkevich!
Felix Yusupov, the dilettantish centre of the Petrograd social scene!

A notable figure of the conservative movement and perhaps the last true landowner in Russia has died yesterday in his rural estate. It is feared that his death may cause a great reshuffling on the right side of the political scene. Tsar Vladimir must now choose a new head of the Committee of Ministers.
The moderate military man, Anton Denikin!
The reactionary military man, Pyotr Wrangel!
Felix Yusupov, the dilettantish centre of the Petrograd social scene!

It is feared that his death may cause a great reshuffling on the right side of the political scene. Tsar Dmitri must now choose a new head of the Committee of Ministers.
The moderate military man, Anton Denikin!
The reactionary military man, Pyotr Wrangel!
Felix Yusupov, the dilettantish centre of the Petrograd social scene!

It is feared that his death may cause a great reshuffling on the right side of the political scene. Tsar Pyotr must now choose a new head of the Committee of Ministers.
The moderate military man, Anton Denikin!
Felix Yusupov, the dilettantish centre of the Petrograd social scene!
A new Chairman of the Committee of Ministers?
Now that Tsar Vladimir has ascended the throne he has taken it upon himself to name the new head of the Committee of Ministers and form a new government
column13: После восшествия на престол император Владимир должен назвать нового главу кабинета министров и сформировать правительство.

column2: The chief of the reactionary landowners, Vladimir Purishkevich!
The moderate military man, Anton Denikin!
Felix Yusupov, the dilettantish centre of the Petrograd social scene!

With the death of Tsar Dmitri and the acension of his son Pavel, who is only 12 years old, the leaders of Russia must choose a new Chairman of the Committee of Ministers who will also have vast new powers as regent.
column13: После смерти императора Дмитрия трон унаследовал его сын Павел, которому всего 12 лет. Правительство России должно решить, кто станет новым председателем кабинета министров, а также регентом при императоре.

column2: The moderate military man, Anton Denikin!
The reactionary military man, Pyotr Wrangel!
The leaders agree to rule together in a Regency Council.
column13: Все лидеры объединятся в Регентский совет.

column2: Aleksander Kolchak has passed away due to a heart attack. He had not named a successor and it is uncertain what Russia's future will be. The legal pretender, Vladimir Romanov, waits for a chance to assume power and restore the legitimate dynasty while liberal movements argue for a restoration of the republic. Nevertheless, before a decision is made a month of mourning and funeral celebrations have been announced.
Invite Vladimir and restore the Romanovs as autocrats!
column13: Пригласить Владимира и восстановить Романовых на престоле

column2: Invite Vladimir and restore the Romanovs as constitutional monarchs.
column13: Пригласить Владимира в качестве конституционного монарха

column2: Pavel Shatilov takes control of Russia!

The former hero of the Russian civil war turned lapdog of Japan, Aleksandr Kolchak, has died in his sleep. Already nationalist are gathering to celebrate demise of the most hated man of the 20th century in the history of Russia.
Milan Rastislav Stefanik Returns to Slovakia
With the liberation of the Central Europe, Milan Rastislav Stefanik has decided to return to Slovakia to play a leading role in the post-liberation armed forces.
Milan Rastislav Stefanik Returns to Slovakia
With the liberation of Central Europe, Milan Rastislav Stefanik has decided to return to Slovakia to play a leading role in the post-liberation Slovakian armed forces.
Milan Rastislav Stefanik Returns to Slovakia
With the liberation of Central Europe, Milan Rastislav Stefanik has decided to return to Slovakia to play a leading role in the post-liberation armed forces of Danubian Federation.

When Dmitri Romanov strengthened his position as a member of the former royal family, he could launch a populist programme, called 'Money for the Motherland' because he sold some his estates and some lands of the other grand dukes, which he had returned anyhow to the state possession before. This populist step helped to gain his reputation of the 'good tsar', who cares for his nation.
I can and will do everything for my people!

During the reign of Kerensky, Russian legislation constituted a bunch of the old imperial laws and some temporary laws, which were used after the Civil War. Using old groundwork of the imperial lawyers, Dmitri Pavlovich is going to restore his authority over all Russian territories and control local elites through these new laws, Criminal as well as the Civil Code.

Dmitri Romanov took power by happy coincidence and isn`t going to lose his position. Though he can control both Duma and Senate, the Grand Duke is in great need of a completely obedient political power. That`s why a new party, called 'Indivisible Russia' was created by Felix Usupov, who was Dmitri`s friend since childhood. This new party is ready to maintain interests of Russia and its President.
This Duma is nothing but a formality!

Maintenance of the democratic regime combined with the stable development of the state led to the emigration of some celebrities from syndicalist countries to Russia. This led, for example, to the arrival in Russia of the good friend of Dmitri Pavlovich, Coco Chanel. That mademoiselle Chanel has chosen to open her office in a village near Tula shows that Russia is a Bastion of Democracy, where everyone can run his or her business without difficulties from the government.
Russia needs a strong state for a strong people!

Because of the civil war in Russia, millions of Russian children became orphans. President Kerensky did almost nothing to improve their lives, but Pyotr Wrangel has another opinion on the matter. The organization 'Yunaya Armiya' ('Young Army') has begun to militarise the asylums and school of the children. The coming generations of the Russian people will get a chance to improve their lives and become builders of a new happier society.

One year has passed since the creation of the 'Yunarmiya'. A lot of young boys and girls got some professional skills, which will help them later, however, the quality of their work skills aren't good enough for our new modern industries. Should we send the to the technical training colleges or let them join the army?
You will be the Vozhd's soldiers at the factories!
Almost 1 million young workers are ready to boost our industrialization throughout Russia. Our decision to send them to the technical training colleges has indeed paid off. Glory to the Vozhd!

One of the most important things for the Black Baron was the thought of spreading his ideology veiled in Russian culture throughout the state. One such way is to create a cheap cinema circuit, which every Russian citizen will be able to visit. A lot of Russian films are already made in the 'Mosfilm' studio and will be distributed to all cities and town. With the power of the cinema Wrangel is going to change the public mind and show Russia a new way to a happy future.
Invite your girlfriend to the cinema!

Volga-Volga is a Russian film comedy directed by Grigori Aleksandrov, released on April 24, 1938. Widely claimed to be Pyotr Wrangel`s favourite movie, this classic musical comedy is a must-see. It centres on a group of amateur performers on their way to Moscow to perform in a talent contest called the Moscow Musical Olympiad. Most of the action takes place on a steamboat travelling on the Volga River.
Funny enough to make the Vozhd smile!
Now that our regime is firmly established we can begin to consider our stance regarding the rest of the world.
column13: После укрепления нашей власти, пришло время определить наши отношения с остальным миром.

column2: Isolationism, Russia is a world in itself!
Realpolitik, take opportunities as they come.
Our system deserves to be extended!!
Now that our regime is firmly established we can begin to consider our stance regarding the rest of the world.
column13: После укрепления нашей власти, пришло время определить наши отношения с остальным миром.

column2: Isolationism, Russia is a world in itself!
Realpolitik, take opportunities as they come.
Our system deserves to be extended!
Now that our regime is firmly established we can begin to consider our stance regarding the rest of the world.
column13: После укрепления нашей власти, пришло время определить наши отношения с остальным миром.

column2: Isolationism, Russia is a world in itself!
Realpolitik, take opportunities as they come.
We do not yet rule all the Russias, we must expand!
Now that our regime is firmly established we can begin to consider our stance regarding the rest of the world.
column13: После укрепления нашей власти, пришло время определить наши отношения с остальным миром.

column2: Isolationism, Russia is a world in itself!
Realpolitik, take opportunities as they come.
We do not yet rule all the Russias, we must expand!
Now that our regime is firmly established we can begin to consider our stance regarding the rest of the world.
column13: После укрепления нашей власти, пришло время определить наши отношения с остальным миром.

column2: Realpolitik, take opportunities as they come.
We do not yet rule all the Russias, we must expand!

Horrible news!  A train full of Russian citizens has been massacred by bandits on the Mongolian section of the Trans-Siberian railroad! Our people are shocked by this act of barbarism and demand an immediate response from the government. This could be an opportunity for us to reassert control over the Far Eastern sections of the railroad but we must tread carefully. Baron Ungern von Sternberg, Supreme Khan of All Mongols, is unhinged and may not take kindly to interference.
We must increase the security on our trains.
Demand a formal apology from the Mongolian government!
column13: Потребовать официальных извинений от монгольского правительства!

column2: Enough! We demand full sovereignty over OUR Trans-Siberian railway!
We shall bring civilization where there is barbarism, send the troops!
column13: Россия принесет цивилизацию этим варварам! Отправить войска!

column2: The Russian government has asked for a formal apology from the Mongolian government after a train carrying Russian citizens was attacked by bandits on our section of the Trans-Siberian railroad.
column13: После нападения бандитов на поезд русское правительство требует от нас официальных извинений.

column2: We express our deepest regrets, send gifts to the bereaved.
We cannot be held responsible for the actions of bandits.
column13: Мы не несем ответственности за действия бандитов

column2: Baron Ungern von Sternberg has expressed his deepest personal regret over the murder of our citizens on the Trans-Siberian railroad and has sent condolences and gifts to the families of the bereaved.
column13: Барон фон Унгерн-Штернберг выразил глубокое сожаление по поводу убийства наших граждан на Транссибирской магистрали и отправил соболезнования и компенсации семьям погибших.

column2: Okay, but we shall be watching the railroad in future!
column13: Хорошо, но в будущем мы будем следить за дорогой!

column2: Baron Ungern von Sternberg has refused to accept any responsibility for the attack on the Trans-Siberian railroad. Our people are shocked and demand immediate response from government !
He is right, it was not his fault.
column13: Он прав, это не его вина

column2: Russia demands full control over the railroad

After a train carrying Russian citizens was attacked by bandits on our section of the Trans-Siberian railroad the Russian government has demanded full control over the railway. Russia is an increasingly powerful country and it is doubtful whether we could win in any confrontation with them.
We shall abandon our portion of the railroad.
column13: Мы должны отказаться от нашего участка железной дороги

column2: We cannot be held responsible for the actions of bandits.
column13: Мы не несем ответственности за действия бандитов

column2: We now have full control over the Trans-Siberian railroad. The way to the East now lies open and Russian honour is restored !

Baron Ungern von Sternberg has given a response to our demands: one hundred ethnic Russians have been executed in Ulaan Baator as a warning for us to not to meddle in Mongolian affairs. He has also asserted Mongolia's historic right to Siberia. How should we react?
We shall wipe Mongolia from the map!
Evacuate all Russian citizens from Mongolia and seal the border.
column13: Эвакуировать наших граждан из Монголии и закрыть границу

column2: The Russians have declared war and are sending trainloads of troops on the Trans-Siberian railroad! This daring Russian act requires an immediate military response!
column13: Русские объявили нам войну и отправили эшелоны с войсками по Транссибирской магистрали!

column2: Let the Russians come, we shall chase them out of Asia!
column13: Пусть русские приходят! Мы выгоним их из Азии!

column2: We have finally seized control of the Mongolian capital! How shall we deal with these barbarians?
column13: Мы взяли под контроль столицу Монголии! Что будем делать с этими варварами?

column2: Let the Mongols join us on OUR terms!
Make an example out of them, unconditional surrender!
The Mongols have folded to our demands!
Our alliance with Baron von Sternberg and Mongolia ended in disaster! Now that the self-proclaimed Khan is a Russian puppet there's nothing to gain for us in this conflict.
column13: Наш союз с бароном Унгерном и Монголией закончился катастрофой! После поражения самопровозглашенного хана нам нет смысла участвовать в конфликте.

column2: Our Russian overlords have installed a new government to supervise our internal development.
column13: Наши новые русские хозяева назначили новое правительство, чтобы контролировать нашу внутреннюю политику.

column2: It's still better than an occupation!
Apparently the rogue Baron is more important to the Mongols than a dignified defeat!
column13: По видимому монголам важнее безумный барон, чем достойный мир!

column2: The wretched Russians have seized our glorious capital! Defeat seems near, is it time to submit ?
We have no choice but to submit...
column13: У нас нет иного выбора, кроме как сдаться...

column2: The Baron shall lead us to victory or death!

The Tuvan people are Turks that live next to the Mongols and they have played an important function in Sternberg's empire. Now that Sternberg is out of the picture the Tuvans are demanding freedom. Granting them this wish would greatly weaken the Mongols.
column13: Тувинцы - это тюрки, которые живут рядом с монголами, они играют важную роль в империи Штернберга. Как только его власть рухнула, они потребовали независимости. Создание тувинского государства в значительной степени ослабит монголов.

column2: Order Mongolia to release Tannu Tuva!
column13: Отправить требование монголам, чтобы освободили тувинцев!

column2: Tannu Tuva will be Russian once more!
They are still Mongols for all we care!

The Tuvan people are Turks that live next to the Mongols and they have played an important function in Sternberg's empire. Now that Sternberg is out of the picture the Tuvans are demanding freedom. Granting them this wish would greatly weaken the Mongols.
column13: Тувинцы - это тюрки, которые живут рядом с монголами, они играют важную роль в империи Штернберга. Как только его власть рухнула, они потребовали независимости. Создание тувинского государства в значительной степени ослабит монголов.

column2: Give them total freedom, once and for all!
Give them limited freedom, they shall remain loyal to us!
Tannu Tuva will be Russian once more!
The Russians have sent us an ultimatum to release the Tuvans!
column13: Русские прислали нам ультиматум, требуя чтобы мы освободили тувинцев!

column2: The Tuvans are now free and at our disposal!
column13: Тувинцы теперь свободны, и под нашим контролем!

column2: The Russians have sent us an ultimatum to secede Tannu Tuva to them!
column13: Русские прислали нам ультиматум, требуя чтобы мы передали им Туву!

column2: Encourage them to plan a plebiscite.
There is no need to vote, all Russians must be under Russian rule!
column13: Нет никакой нужды голосовать, все русские должны быть под  властью России!

column2: Send a detachment of troops to Vladivostok to dissolve Transamur!
column13: Отправить войска во Владивосток, чтобы уничтожить Заамурскую республику!

column2: Following the re-establishment of Russian control over the Trans-Siberian railroad the Russians have announced that the Transmur-Primorsk region is rightfully a Russian province! Can we afford to oppose an increasingly powerful Russia for the sake of Transamur or should we concentrate on China?
Send a warning, Transamur is our protectorate!
A strong Russia would be a better ally than little Transamur.
column13: Сильная Россия лучший союзник, чем маленькое Заамурье

column2: Following the re-establishment of Russian control over the Trans-Siberian railroad the Russians have decided to enlist the support of some rebellious Transamurian capitalists in order to establish control over the Primorsk territory by force! Can we afford to oppose an increasingly powerful Russia for the sake of Transamur or should we concentrate on China?
A strong Russia would be a better ally than little Transamur.
column13: Сильная Россия лучший союзник, чем маленькое Заамурье

column2: A most unexpected turn of events! The Japanese have decided that their interests lie in China rather than Siberia and have offered to acknowledge our control over Transamur, and offer us Chinese Central Asia as a sphere of influence, if we help them in their military operations against the Chinese.
Okay, but we demand Northern Sakhalin as well!
column13: Хорошо, но мы также требуем Северный Сахалин

column2: We cannot trust the treacherous Japanese!
column13: Мы не можем доверять предателям японцам!

column2: The Russians have agreed in principle to an alliance aimed against China, but as a precondition of support they want the return of territories taken by Japan during the Russian civil war.
column13: Русские согласились на союз, который направлен против Китая, но в качестве предварительного условия, они хотят территории, захваченные Японией во время Гражданской Войны в России.

column2: Very well, we are friends now.
No, these territories are rightfully Japanese!
column13: Нет, эти территории по праву японские!

column2: No, and we shall keep an eye on Transamur!
column13: Нет, и мы будем следить за Заамурьем

column2: How dare they insult Japan like this? Attack!
column13: Как они посмели так оскорбить Японию? Атаковать их!

column2: Facing the threat of Russian military force and deprived of the support of the local capitalists and the Japanese, Transamur's government is ready to collapse in the face of the popular will. We can now do what we like with Transamur but it has been independent for a long time and will be difficult to integrate into our country. Perhaps some sort of compromise is needed?
No compromise, put their leaders on trial and incorporate Transamur!
column13: Никаких компромиссов, Колчака под суд, Заамурье включить в состав России

column2: Administer Transamur as an autonomous zone for now.
column13: Сделать Заамурье автономной территорий в России

column2: The Japanese have sent a warning

The Japanese are not happy that we are interfering in Transamur's internal politics and have warned us that it is rightfully a Japanese protectorate. However, they have other military concerns at the moment and may not be willing to risk a two front war to protect a colony of minimal importance.
Sever relations with Japan and maintain commercial links with Transamur.
column13: Разорвать отношения с Японией, поддерживать торговые связи с Заамурьем

column2: Call their bluff, send in the troops!

Following the re-establishment of Russian control over the Trans-Siberian railway our business leaders are beginning to see that the economic stability of our region depends more on Russia than on Japan. They have gained the support of the Russian governemnt for a plebiscite to see if our people want to rejoin Russia.
Allow it, but rig the results.
Agree, but Kolchak must govern Russia!
column13: Согласится, но Колчак должен управлять Россией

column2: The government of Transamur has seen reason. They have agreed to give the people of the Tranamur Republic a free and fair election to determine whether they want to rejoin Russia.
column13: Колчак позволил провести в Заамурьее свободные и честные выборы, чтобы определить, хочет ли народ вернуться в состав России.

column2: The people flock to the polling stations and have made their decision.
column13: Люди проголосовали, и вот что получилось:

column2: The people of Transamur have voted. They have decided to remain an independent Republic under Japanese protection.
column13: Народ Заамурья проголосовал и решил остаться независимой республикой под японской защитой.

column2: We shall accept the will of the people.
We shall keep an eye on Transamur.
We shall send in the army!

The government of Transamur has seen reason. They have agreed to give the people of the Tranamur Republic an election to determine whether they want to rejoin Russia. However, we have been informed that there are certain irregularities in the procedure.
column13: Колчак позволил провести в Заамурьее свободные и честные выборы, чтобы определить, хочет ли народ вернуться в состав России. Тем не менее, мы были проинформированы, что будут определенные нарушения в процедуре голосования.

column2: Never mind, we shall await the results.
How dare they? Send troops to oberve the election!
column13: Как они смеют? Отправить войска наблюдать за выборами!

column2: The people flock to the polling stations which are heavily protected by police patrols and managed by a large officially appointed bureaucratic staff. They have made their decision.
column13: Люди пришли в избирательные участки, которые охраняются полицей и в которые посажено большое количество контролируемой бюрократии. Они решили:

column2: Kolchak demands to become Russian Prime Minister!

Kolchak has decided to throw his lot in with Vladivostok's business community. He will allow his country to become incorporated into Russia if he is given the post of Prime Minister as part of a government of compromise.
column13: Колчак позволит Заамурью войти в состав России, если получит пост премьер-министра России в компромиссаном правительстве.

column2: Establish a government of compromise, Kolchak for Prime Minister!
What is this lunacy? Send in the troops!
Refuse and maintain ties with Transamur's independance groups.
column13: Отказать и поддержать связи с прорусскими группами в Заамурье

column2: The government of Transamur has put their foot down. They have arrested the organisers of the plebiscite, publically stating that Tranamur is an independent state with a long historical tradition of independence from Russia, they say they will never rejoin our country.
We shall keep an eye on Transamur.
We shall send in the army!
Russia has taken hold of Transamur!
Russia has managed to establish its control over the Transamur Republic. Can we accept this diminishment of the Co-prosperity Sphere?
column13: Россия установила свой контроль над Заамурьем. Можем ли мы согласится с уменьшением Сферы взаимного процветания?

column2: We have more important things to fight over than this!
column13: У нас есть более важные вещи, чем это!

column2: A strong Russia would be a better ally than little Transamur.
column13: Сильная Россия лучший союзник, чем маленькое Заамурье

column2: We shall keep an eye on Transamur.
How dare they insult Japan like this? Attack!
column13: Как они посмели так оскорбить Японию? Атаковать их!

column2: The great Far Eastern port city of Vladivostok is Russian once more! There are many ships in the harbour, including the bulk of Transamur's old navy as well as those owned by private individuals or companies. Some of these could be adapted for military purposes, one of them is a tanker which is large enough to be converted into a basic aircraft carrier.
We shall seize and convert all of the ships in the harbour!
column13: Мы должны захватить и переоборудовать все корабли в гавани!

column2: We shall merely use Transamur's old naval designs.
column13: Мы должны использовать старые Заамурские корабли

column2: Sell off Transamur's navy and convert the harbour for civilian purposes.
column13: Распродать Заамурский флот, и преобразовать гавань для чисто гражданских целей

column2: Sell off Transamur's navy and keep the money.
column13: Распродать Заамурский флот и сохранить деньги

column2: For years our naval chiefs have lamented our lack of presence on the Black Sea, which had traditionally been Russian. Our new Ukrainian allies are very grateful to us for liberating them from foreign domination and should be willing to lease us the Crimea as a naval base in exchange for Russian technical expertise and money.
Leave the Crimea for the Ukraine.
Russia asks to lease the Crimea

The Russians have asked that they be allowed to lease the Crimea as a naval base for 99 years in exchange for a considerable sum of money and Russian technical expertise. We are under Russian authority now and it would be difficult for us to refuse.
column13: Русские попросили у нас Крым в аренду для базы ВМФ на 99 лет, в обмен на большие деньги и технические знания. Мы сейчас под властью русских, для нас было бы трудно отказаться.

column2: Give the Crimea to the Russians.
No, the Crimea is Ukrainian now!
The Ukrainians have agreed to grant us a 99 year lease on the Crimea!
column13: Украинцы согласились предоставить нам Крым в аренду на 99 лет!

column2: The Ukrainians refuse to lease the Crimea!
column13: Украина отказывается сдать Крым в аренду!

column2: The Ukrainians have refused our offer! How should we react to this humiliation?
column13: Как мы поступим в этой ситуации?

column2: They had better control the Black Sea well for us.
column13: Для нас будет лучше, если они будут контролировать Черное море
Неблагодарные! Мы вернем ваши земли себе!

column2: The great Black Sea port city of Sevastopol is Russian once more! There are many ships in the harbour, including a number of decommissioned warships from the Ukrainian navy as well as a few ships owned by private companies.
We shall seize and convert all of the ships in the harbour!
We shall upgrade the Ukrainian ships.
Sell off Ukraine's navy and convert the harbour for civilian purposes.
Sell off Ukraine's navy and keep the money.
We are at war in the Caucasus but are having grave difficulties because the Cossack territories are in the way!
column13: Мы воююем на Кавказе, но возникли серьезные трудности с продвижением из-за казацких территорий.

column2: Demand that the Cossacks grant us military access.
column13: Потребовать от казаков дать нам проход войск

column2: Use the opportunity to demand that the Cossacks submit to Russia!
column13: Использовать возможность для того, чтобы вернуть территории казаков под контроль России
Россия требует проход войск через наши земли

column2: The Russians are demanding the right to march through Cossack territories so that they can fight their war in the Caucasus!
column13: Русские требует проход войск через наши территории для того, чтобы воевать на Кавказе. Как мы отреагируем?

column2: The Russians demand the right to march through Cossack territories so that they can fight their war in the Caucasus. They have also demanded that we become a Russian protectorate to maintain stability in the region!
column13: Русские требуют проход войск через наши территории для того, чтобы воевать на Кавказе. Также они потребовали, чтобы мы стали их проекторатом, для поддержания стабильности в регионе!

column2: The Cossacks will not let us through!
column13: Казаки отклонили наши требования. Что мы будем делать?

column2: Then we shall find another route to the Caucasus.
column13: Мы найдем другой путь на Кавказ

column2: Then we will attack them as well!
The Cossacks have agreed to reason and will submit and become a Russian vassal state.
column13: Казаки согласились пропустить наши войска, а также стать нашим проекторатом

column2: Japan and Qing China are at war. Russia has traditionally had interests on expanding into areas currently under the authority of both of these countries. We could now use this conflict to our advanatge, possibly by backing one side against the other.
column13: Япония и империя Цин находятся в состоянии войны

column2: We cannot afford to become mixed up in this.
column13: Мы не можем позволить себе вмешаться

column2: We will send aid to China.
We shall use the opportunity to claim Chinese Central Asia!
column13: Воспользоваться противостоянием для претензий на китайскую Среднюю Азию

column2: We shall become involved in the war ourselves.
column13: Мы сами должны вступить в войну

column2: This is a risky strategy, but one which may reap great rewards for Russia! Which side should we join?
column13: Это рискованно, но может многое принести России. Но к кому мы должны присоединиться?

column2: We shall attempt to ally with China against Japan.
column13: Атаковать Японию и предложить союз иперии Цин!

column2: We shall attempt to ally with Japan against China.
column13: Атаковать империю Цин и предложить союз Японии!

column2: We will attack Japan by ourselves.
We will attack China by ourselves.
We are both engaged in a war against the vile Japanese and their imperialistic designs, perhaps it would be a good idea for us to cooperate more closely?
column13: Наши страны вовлечены в войну против японцев и их империалистических планов, возможно, нам стоит более тесно сотрудничать?

column2: Attempt to join the Qing Chinese alliance.
We will send aid to China.
We will fight the Japanese alone!
column13: Мы будем сражаться с Японией одни!

column2: The Russians have attacked China and are offering to cooperate with us militarily as long as we acknowledge their rights over Chinese Central Asia.
column13: Русские напали на Китай и предложили нам военное сотрудничество, если мы признаем их права на китайскую Среднюю Азию.

column2: We accept, Russia shall be a fine addition to our alliance!
No, we cannot trust the Russians!
column13: Нет, мы не можем доверять русским!

column2: The Russians have attacked Japan and are offering to cooperate with us militarily as long as we acknowledge their rights over the former Russian Far East.
column13: Русские напали на Японию и предложили нам военное сотрудничество, если мы признаем их права на бывший русский Дальний Восток.

column2: No, we cannot trust the Russians!
column13: Нет, мы не можем доверять русским!

column2: The Russians have sent us a considerable amount of money and military technology in order to help us in our struggle against our mutual enemies, the Empire of Japan!
column13: Русские прислали нам значительную сумму денег и военной техники для того, чтобы помочь нам в борьбе против общего врага - Японской империи!

column2: Russia and Japan are at war! This could be our chance to extend Mongolian rule into Siberia or China, although we would probably need the backing of one of the sides in the war to feasibly expand.
column13: Россия и Япония находятся в состоянии войны! Это наш шанс завладеть частью Сибири или Китая, но нам потребуется поддержка одной из сторон.
Мы не можем позволить себе вмешиваться

column2: Baron Ungern von Sternberg has decided that it is time to join our war against Russia and has attacked Russian border defences in Siberia. Mongolian diplomats have offered to cooperate in our alliance more formally, can we trust them?
column13: Барон Унгерн фон Штернберг решил, что настало время присоединиться к нашей войне против России и пересек русскую границу в Сибири. Монгольские дипломаты предложили нам заключить союз, но можем ли мы доверять им?

column2: No, we cannot trust these treacherous Mongolians!
column13: Нет, мы не можем доверять этим коварным монголам!

column2: Baron Ungern von Sternberg has decided that it is time to join our war against Japan and has attacked Japanese border defences in Manchuria. Mongolian diplomats have offered to cooperate in our alliance more formally, can we trust them?
column13: Барон Унгерн фон Штернберг решил, что настало время присоединиться к нашей войне против Японии и пересек японскую границу в Маньчжурии. Монгольские дипломаты предложили нам заключить союз, но можем ли мы доверять им?

column2: No, we cannot trust these treacherous Mongolians!
column13: Нет, мы не можем доверять этим коварным монголам!

column2: Stability comes back to Central Asia where, since the fall of Tsarist Russia, tribes and hordes were fighting each other. Now our Central Asian border is much more secure and we can strengthen ourselves in Ural.
column13: Стабильность вернулась в Среднюю Азию, где после падения царской России племена и орды постоянно воюют друг с другом. Теперь мы обезопасили нашу границу в Средней Азии, и можем спать спокойно.

column2: Stability comes back to Siberia, where barbaric Mongols and the treacherous admiral Kolchak had been trying to drive Russia in chaos. Now our Siberian border is much more secure and we can strengthen ourselves in Siberia.
column13: Стабильность вернулась в Сибирь, где варвары монголы и японцы пытались погрузить нас в хаосе. Теперь наши сибирские границы в безопасности и мы можем спать спокойно.

column2: The peasants and workers of the Ukraine have finally thrown off the shackles of German dependence, they have left the German-dominated Mitteleuropa alliance. This presents us with the unique opportunity to either reclaim some of the territories we were forced to give up through the treaty of Brest-Litovsk or try to create a powerful new military bloc in eastern Europe with the Ukraine.
A perfect chance to reintegrate Ukraine by force!

Powerful German armies had been protecting Ukraine from annexation since the October revolution. Now that the Ukranians have decided to break diplomatic relations with Germany in favour of the French we can reclaim the Ukraine. The peasants, who mostly are describing themselves as 'locals' instead of 'Ukrainians', are still angry about the agricultural crisis and they yearn for Tsarist era stability. Orthodox priests, many of them Russian, are complaining about closing churches and forced Ukranization.
We will liberate the Ukraine from the evil Syndicalists by force!
column13: Мы зав... освободим Украину от синдикалистов силой!

column2: We will liberate the Ukraine from the evil Syndicalists by force!
column13: Мы зав... освободим Украину от синдикалистов силой!

column2: We will liberate the Ukraine from the evil Syndicalists by force!
column13: Мы зав... освободим Украину от синдикалистов силой!

column2: Start giving passports and citizenships to every Russian in Ukraine!
column13: Предосталять паспорт и гражданство каждому русскому на Украине!

column2: Covert operations will be good enough.
We don't care about the Ukraine.
column13: Нас не волнуют русские на Украине

column2: Soviet Russia offers us an alliance!
The Russians have sent word that they consider our two states to be alike and they are suggesting that we should work together to promote the global cause of labour. What should we do?
column13: Русские предложили нам союз, чтобы нашим государствам рабочих и крестьян было легче добиться своих целей.

column2: Of course, all proletarians should work together!
column13: Конечно, все пролетарии должны быть вместе!

column2: We cannot trust the treacherous Russians!
The Russians have sent word that they consider our two states to be alike and they are suggesting that we should work together to promote the global cause of labour. What should we do?
column13: Русские предложили нам союз, чтобы нашим государствам рабочих и крестьян было легче добиться своих целей.

column2: Of course, all proletarians should work together!
column13: Конечно, все пролетарии должны быть вместе!

column2: We cannot trust the treacherous Russians!
A new power in the east!
The government of the Ukraine has accepted our offer, a new power in the east is born. With such a powerful alliance emerging on the global stage the future of the proletariat looks promising.
column13: Правительство Украины приняло наше предложение. С такими мощным союзником на Востоке, будущее пролетариата выглядит многообещающе...

column2: In their arrogance the government of the Ukraine has turned down our offer, saying that the ideological rift between us is too great for an alliance to form. How shall we react to this humiliation?
column13: Правительство Украины заявило, что пропасть между нашими идеологиями слишком велика для заключения союза. Как мы отреагируем?

column2: They shall pay for their foolishness!
A new power in the east!
The government of the Ukraine has accepted our offer, a new power in the east is born. With such a powerful alliance emerging on the global stage the future of the proletariat looks promising.
column13: Правительство Украины приняло наше предложение. С такими мощным союзником на Востоке, будущее пролетариата выглядит многообещающе...

column2: In their arrogance the government of the Ukraine has turned down our offer, saying that the ideological rift between us is too great for an alliance to form. How shall we react to this humiliation?
column13: Правительство Украины заявило, что пропасть между нашими идеологиями слишком велика для заключения союза. Как мы отреагируем?

column2: They shall pay for their foolishness!

Thousands of our citizens are rushing for passports given by the Russian government. This is a threat to our stability, security, and the integrity of our country! We must do something about this before they try to secede.
column13: Тысячи русских спешат получить российский паспорт. Это серьезная угроза целостности нашей страны! Мы должны что-то сделать, прежде чем они попытаются отделиться.

column2: Give them Crimea and Eastern Ukraine, they have a majority there.
column13: Передать России Крым и Восточную Украину

column2: We will punish them, comrades to arms!
column13: Мы не позволим им сделать это, объявить войну!

column2: Ukrainians, fearing unrest, decided to give us Crimea and Eastern Ukraine. How we shall respond?
column13: Опасаясь волнений, Украина решила передать нам Крым и Восточную Украину. Как мы должны реагировать?

column2: We want all of the Ukraine!
We are content with what we have.

column13: Крым и Восточная Украина присоединились к России!

column2: Our tolerance for Russian actions has allowed them to take Crimea and Eastern Ukraine.
column13: Наша терпимость к действиям России помогла ей занять Крым и Восточную Украину

column2: Ukraine is dead, and we take...
The Russians in Eastern Ukraine and Crimea have rebelled, how much of the weakened Ukraine state will we take?
column13: Русские в Восточной Украине восстали и присоединились к нашему государству. Должны ли мы вернуть оставшуюся часть Украины?

column2: We have managed to replace the Syndicalist Ukrainian government with a more loyal one.
column13: Нам удалось сменить синдикалистское украинское правительство на более лояльное к нам.

column2: We have failed to replace the Syndicalist Ukrainian government with a more loyal one.
column13: Нам не удалось сменить синдикалистское украинское правительство на более лояльное к нам.

column2: Russian coup in Ukraine - relations with Russia
Khruschev was dismissed by pro-Russian politicians. Now the future of the Ukraine lies in their hands. What will we do?
column13: Хрущев ушел в отставку и передал власть пророссийским политикам. Теперь будущее Украины в их руках. Что мы будем делать?

column2: The new Malorossian cabinet decided that they will fully join our motherland.
column13: Новый украинский кабинет министров высказался за присоединение к России

column2: Keep them independent under our supervision.
Malorossia wants to create a union with Russia
column13: Украина хочет заключить союз с нами

column2: The new Malorosian cabinet has decided that they will submit to Russia while keeping their state formally independent.
column13: Новый украинский кабинет министров высказался за союз с Россией

column2: The Russian ambassador has approached the minister of foreign affairs about dissolving the Don-Kuban Union. Since the '20s Germany has guaranteed our independence but the Russians look at them as a 'rebellious state'. If we withdraw support for the Cossacks and allow the annexation Russia would be much more eager to cooperate with us. Let's remember that Russia has many means of interfering in Don-Kuban so even if we refuse to talk the situation in the Caucasus can change.
The Russians are right, it's a part of their country.
column13: Русские правы, это часть их страны

column2: Germany decided to leave us alone. Now we are defenceless against the mighty Russian armies!
column13: Германия оставила нас одних. Как мы будем действовать против превосходящей русской армии?

column2: Our skillful diplomacy was able to provoke the Don-Kuban Union into declaring war upon us. Now we can finally reclaim the Don-Kuban union without needing to worry about international reactions.
Novorossiysk and Grozny are coming back to the Motherland.
Germans refuse to give up on Don-Kuban
Despite our best efforts the Germans have refused to withdraw their guarantee of independence of the Don-Kuban Union. We must think about other ways of seizing the Cossack state.
column13: Несмотря на все наши усилия, немцы отказались прерывать сотрудничество с казаками. Теперь нужно искать другие пути для возвращения наших территорий.

column2: Influence local business leaders to organise a plebiscite!
The country is thrown into chaos!

Russian agitators has fueled popular opinion against the Cossacks. The Russians in our countryside and in our cities have rebelled. Chechens and Ingushens have declared a jihad against our government. The Country is in chaos, what will happen next?
column13: Русские агитаторы настроили общество против казаков. Русские в деревнях восстали, чеченцы и ингуши объявили джихад нашей власти. Страна в хаосе, как можно исправить ситуацию?

column2: Russian Coup succeeds in Don-Kuban Union
Russians and Caucasian tribes have defeated the Cossacks. the future of the Don-Kuban lies in our hands.
column13: Русские и кавказцы победили казаков. Будущее Дона и Кубани в наших руках.

column2: The Don-Kuban Union comes back to the Motherland!
column13: Дон и Кубань снова с нами!

column2: Local business leaders, inspired by the Russians, want a plebiscite concerning the future of our nation. How should we respond?
column13: Влиятельные бизнесмены хотят провести плебисцит о присоединении к России. Что мы им ответим?

column2: The people are flocking to the polling stations. Perhaps democracy can work from time to time.
column13: Люди толпами идут на избирательные участки. Иногда демократия работает.
Дон и Кубань снова принадлежат России

column2: It seems that our peaceful policy towards the Don-Kuban has failed. Now we have to reconsider more aggressive paths.
column13: Похоже наша мирная политика в отношении Доно-Кубанского Союза не принесла успеха. Нужно искать более агрессивные пути.

column2: Perhaps we have to overthrow Cossack rule over Don-Kuban.
column13: Возможно, стоит свергнуть власть казаков на Дону и Кубани

column2: Attack only if the Germans won't help them.
column13: Атаковать, но толдько когда немцы не смогут им помочь

column2: The Cossack state is more stable than we thought, we can't defeat them.
column13: Казацкое государство оказалось слишком сильно, мы не сможем его победить

column2: Take over the Baku Oil Concern and control their Government!
column13: Взять под контроль Бакинский нефтяной концерн и увеличить влияние на правительство Азербайджана

column2: Guarantee the security of Azerbaijan and invest in the oil fields.
column13: Мы гарантируем независимость Азребайджана и инвестируем в нефтепромышленность

column2: Who built Baku's oil plants? Make plans for a hostile takeover!
column13: Кто построил нефтезаводы Баку? Мы вернем их силой!

column2: We shall take back our stolen plants by force, right now!
We need neither oil nor entanglements in the Caucasus!

The Russian Government has purchased a massive stake in the Baku Oil Concern and are planning on administering, securing and building up large portions of our oil fields themselves. This would mean that we would lose control over much of our government but would at least present us with a powerful patron.
Invite the Russians to protect and develop Azerbaijan.
column13: Пригласить русских защищать и развивать Азербайджан.

column2: Decline the offer, attempt to limit Russian influence!
column13: Отклонить предложение и снизить влияние России

column2: The foolish Azerbaijani government rejected our attempts to exert our influence over their government. How shall we react to this insolence?
column13: Глупые лидеры Азербайджана отклонили все наши попытки повлиять на их правительство. Как мы отреагируем на эту наглость?

column2: Azerbaijan has accepted our purchase of a majority stake in their state oil industry. This gives us a large enough foothold to either totally dominate the economy and government of the country or attempt to begin plans to reincorporate them into Russia.
column13: Азербайджан принял предложение о покупке контрольного пакета акций их нефтяной промышленности. Это позволит нам контролировать экономику и правительство страны, или, даже, вернуть страну в состав России.

column2: Establish control over the Azeri economy.
Start to plan on how best to incorporate Azerbaijan into Russia!
column13: Разработать план по включению Азербайджана в Россию

column2: With Russian domination over Azerbaijan stable some members of our goverment think that the time has come for the integration of Azerbaijan into the growing Russian empire. It would be quite easy to pass a series of laws which would ensure that the region is more firmly integrated into Russia.
It is time for Russia to directly rule over Azerbaijan!

The former White Ruthenian state is now under our direct military control. We cannot hope to keep the areas of the former state in line for too long, though. Most politicians are calling for the restoration of White Ruthenia as a buffer state, with the eastern parts of the country directly integrated into Russia. However, nationalists strongly disagree with this kind of solution and instead they demand that White Ruthenia be permanently integrated into Russia.
Integrate areas with a Russian majority and restore White Ruthenia!

The former White Ruthenian state is now under our direct military control. We cannot hope to keep the areas of the former state in line for too long, though. Most politicians are calling for the restoration of White Ruthenia as a buffer state, with the eastern parts of the country directly integrated into Russia. However, nationalists strongly disagree with this kind of solution and instead they demand that White Ruthenia be permanently integrated into Russia.
Integrate areas with a Russian minority and restore White Ruthenia!
column13: Интегрировать районы с русским меньшинством и восстановить Белоруссию!

column2: We have decided that it will be in Russia's best interest if an independent White Ruthenia emerges on the Russian border. How much independence will it really have?
column13: Мы решили, что Белоруссия должна быть независима. Но какова будет эта независимость?

column2: Belarus is once again independent under Russian supervision.
column13: Belarus is once again independent. Under russian supervision.....
Политика в отношении меньшинств бывшей Белоруссии

column2: We have decided that it will be in Russia's best interest if White Ruthenia is absorbed into Russia. Now an important question arises about our minority policies towards our new subjects. Shall we continue with the pre-1914 Russification policies?
column13: Мы решили, что вся Белоруссию будет интегрирована. Но возникает важный вопрос, будем ли мы продолжать политику русификации до 1914 года, или это бесполезно?

column2: Guarantee wide rights for all minorities in White Ruthenia!
column13: Гарантировать права всем меньшинствам в Белоруссии!
Политика в отношении меньшинств бывшей Белоруссии

column2: We have decided that it will be in Russia's best interest if White Ruthenia is absorbed into Russia. Now an important question arises about our minority policies towards our new subjects. Shall we continue with the pre-1914 Russification policies?
column13: Мы решили, что вся Белоруссию будет интегрирована. Но возникает важный вопрос, будем ли мы продолжать политику русификации до 1914 года, или это бесполезно?

column2: Guarantee wide rights for all minorities in White Ruthenia!
column13: Гарантировать права всем меньшинствам в Белоруссии!

column2: The territories of the former White Ruthenian states are now fully absorbed into Mother Russia.
column13: Территории бывшей Белоруссии теперь полностю интегрированы.

column2: Thanks to our successful Russification policies the territories of White Ruthenia are now fully absorbed into Mother Russia.
column13: Благодаря нашей политике русификации территории бывшей Белоруссии теперь полностю интегрированы.

column2: The former Ukrainian state is now under our direct military control. We cannot hope to keep the areas of the former state in line for too long, though. Most politicians argue for the restoration of the Ukraine as a buffer state with the eastern parts of the country directly integrated into Russia. However, nationalists strongly disagree with this kind of solution and instead they demand that the Ukraine be permanently integrated into Russia.
Integrate areas with a Russian majority and restore Ukraine!

The former Ukrainian state is now under our direct military control. We cannot hope to keep the areas of the former state in line for too long, though. Most politicians argue for the restoration of the Ukraine as a buffer state with the eastern parts of the country directly integrated into Russia. However, nationalists strongly disagree with this kind of solution and instead they demand that the Ukraine be permanently integrated into Russia.
Integrate areas with a Russian minority and restore the Ukraine!
column13: Интегрировать районы с русским меньшинством и восстановить Украину!

column2: We have decided that it will be in Russia's best interest if an independent Ukraine emerges on the Russian border. How much independence will it really have?
column13: Мы решили, что Украина должна быть независима. Но какова будет эта независимость?

column2: Malorossia is once again independent under Russian supervision.
column13: Малороссия вновь независима. Под контролем России...

column2: Minority policies in the former Ukraine
column13: Политика в отношении меньшинств бывшей Украины

column2: We have decided that it will be in Russia's best interest to integrate the Ukraine into Russia. An important question arises about our policies towards our new subjects. Shall we continue with the pre-1914 Russification policies or shall we guarantee wide array of cultural rights for our new subjects ?
Guarantee wide rights for all minorities in Ukraine!
Minority policies in the former Ukraine
column13: Политика в отношении меньшинств бывшей Украины

column2: We have decided that it will be in Russia's best interest to integrate the Ukraine into Russia. An important question arises about our policies towards our new subjects. Shall we continue with the pre-1914 Russification policies or shall we guarantee wide array of cultural rights for our new subjects ?
Guarantee wide rights for all minorities in the White Ruthenia!
Territories of the former Ukrainian state are now fully absorbed into Mother Russia.
column13: Территории бывшей Украины теперь полностю интегрированы.

column2: Thanks to our successful Russification policies the former Ukrainian state is now fully absorbed into Mother Russia.
column13: Благодаря нашей политике русификации территории бывшей Украины теперь полностю интегрированы.

column2: Many conservative politicians, influential industrialists and high-ranking officers are pressing us to send a mission to Russia. The former First Lord of the Admirality and Minister of War, Winston Churchill, has become the leader of the
This is a waste of time.

The Canadian Prime Minister has sent a British-Canadian mission to Russia to help in the modernisation of the army and improving the efficiency of our war industry. The commission is led by Winston Churchill, who has impressed the Russian officials with his achievements in both military and civilian fields. It is widely speculated that Canadian companies will invest large sums of money in our high-technology companies and factories crucial for warfare.

column13: Это пойдет на пользу нам и нашим союзникам

column2: One of the advantages of being in the Entente is a high interest of Canadian corporations and firms in our market. As we develop we need machinery which can hardly be manfactured in our country. Foreign investment will help in modernization efforts. This will benefit both us and Canada.

column13: Это пойдет на пользу нам и нашим союзникам

column2: Recently the Russian Ministry of Foreign Relations has forwarded the proposition of tightening relations between us. We know from confidential sources that our mining companies are interested in Siberian deposits of diamonds, copper, and other various metals and minerals and they will need our support. We have to decide whether or not corporations can invest in Russia, thus helping to strenghten relations with them.
Yes, we will grant them money!
column13: Да, мы предоставим им необходимые средства

column2: No, this is a waste of resources.
Australian corporations are investing in Siberia!
Despite the unstable situation at the Siberian border Australasian minining companies are investing! That's a sign that Australasian-Russian friendship is blossoming.
column13: Несмотря на не очень стабильную ситуацию в Сибири, австралазийские компании вкладывают в нее средства. Это значит, что дружба с Австралазией процветает!

column2: Unlike Canada or Australasia we can't disperse our limited industrial potential to help the backwards members of the Entente. We have a lot of good officers, however, which we could send to Russia to help the Russian army in its modernization.
column13: В отличии от Канады или Австралазии, мы не можем использовать наш малый производственный потенциал для того, чтобы помочь России и другим отсталым членам Антанты. Зато у нас много хороших офицеров, которые могут помочь российской армии в модернизации.

column2: Nationalist Frenchmen, hoping to emphasize their importance in the Entente, have decided to send a military mission to Russia. The mission was quite sucessful as we have learned many things from French generals, who are in favour of sending instructors to our officer colleges to teach them guerrilla warfare.

Our Russian allies have proposed the creation of a Eurasian bloc to spread the influence of our alliance to other countries in the world, especially in Asia. Another reason for that move may be strenghtening our image in Russia, which is not very good. If we accept this we will show our strength to the whole world, particulary to Germany and Canada which are Pacific superpowers.
Yes! We will bring together Europe and Asia!
column13: Да! Мы объединим всю Европу и Азию!

column2: Trade relations between Russia and Japan
column13: Торговые отношения между Россией и Японией

column2: The Japanese Committee for Pacific Trade suggests that the trade between our two countries isn't profitable due to tariffs imposed by both countries. If we abolished the tariffs and facilitated the procurement of licences we would convince the Japanese government that we want to expand trade between allied countries, maybe even persuade them to do the same. Lowering the tarrifs would significantly increase the importance of Russian-Japanese trade.
Yes, our allies need special treatment.
column13: Да, наши союзники нуждаются в особом отношении

column2: Helping the growth of Russian-Japanese trade
The Russians have, in order to increase commerce between Russia and Japan, lowered the tariffs and facilitated the bureaucracy. It's a good idea to do the same.
column13: Русские с целью увеличения торговли с нами, упростили бюрократические процедуры и снизили пошлины. Было бы хорошо сделать то же самое...

column2: Due to both our nations lowering the tariffs, sea trade between Russia and Japan has become profitable enough to let Vladivostok flourish!
column13: После снижения пошлин морская торговля стала еще больее выгодной, поэтому Владивосток теперь процветает!

column2: Due to our nations lowering the tariffs, sea trade between Russia and Japan has become profitable enough to let Kanazawa flourish!
column13: После снижения пошлин морская торговля стала еще больее выгодной, поэтому Канадзава теперь процветает!

column2: Great Patriotic War against the Commune of France
column13: Великая Отечественная Война против Французской Коммуны

column2: We will march through Avenue des Champs-Йlysйes!
column13: Мы проведем парад по Елисейским Полям!

column2: Great Patriotic War against the Commune of France
column13: Великая Отечественная Война против Французской Коммуны

column2: We will march through Avenue des Champs-Йlysйes!
column13: Мы проведем парад по Елисейским Полям!

column2: Great Patriotic War against the German Empire
We will march under Brandenburg Gate!
Great Patriotic War against the German Empire
We will march under Brandenburg Gate!

Now the hour is at hand to choose our destiny! Russia's strength and potential allows us to do as we please. The most suitable option, however, is not to join any alliances at all or create a new alliance.
column13: Настало время определить наше будущее! У нас есть возможность присоединиться к одному из союзов, но многие хотят не связываться с ними, а создать собственный.

column2: We have special bonds with the Entente.
column13: У нас есть соглашения с Антантой

column2: We will create a new global alliance!
We don't need any allies, we will stay out of global affairs.

The hour is at hand to choose our destiny! Russia's strength and potential allows us to do as we please. The most suitable option, however, is to join the Entente to secure ourselves from the Syndicalists and German expansion.
column13: Настало время определить наше будущее! У нас есть возможность присоединиться к одному из союзов, но наиболее приемлимым вариантом является объеденение с Антантой, чтобы обезопасить себя от синдикалистов и немецкой экспансии.

column13: Настало время определить наше будущее! У нас есть возможность присоединиться к одному из союзов, но многие хотят не связываться с ними, а создать собственный.

column2: We will fight for a better world with the Commune of France!
column13: Мы будем бороться за лучший мир с Французской Коммуной!
