column13: Грузины предлагают нам заключить союз. Они считают, что наши государства похожи и вместе мы достигнем больших успехов в борьбе за счастье трудящихся. Как мы поступим?

column2: There is to be no reconciliation between our two positions.
The success of the Russian Revolution!

After a long and bitter struggle the Russian workers have finally regained their freedom from their capitalist oppressors! It is time to help them recover and to combine our efforts to free the oppressed around the world!
column13: После долгой и упорной борьбы российский пролетариат сбросил власть капиталистических угнетателей! Мы должны помочь им восстановиться, а затем объединить наши усилия ради освобождения угнетенных всего мира!

column2: The Americans offer us a treaty

The American Syndicates officially recognize our state and they offer us a Friendship and Cooperation Treaty. Although their methods seem to be slightly different it seems that we strive towards the same goal, that of freeing the people from the oppression of Capitalism.
We can not sign this just yet.
The Syndicalists of America have officially recognized our newly created Soviet state!
column13: Американские синдикалисты официально признали наше недавно созданное Советское государство!

column2: The Soviet government has agreed to sign our Cooperation treaty. This is the beginning of a long and prosperous friendship between the Russian and the American peoples.
column13: Советское правтельство согласилось подписать договор о взаимопомощи. Это начало долгой и плодотворной дружбы русского и американского народов.

column2: The Russians say that they are unable to sign our treaty just yet.
column13: РУсские сообщают, что пока не будут подписывать никаких договоров.

column2: Now that Soviet power is firmly established within the heartland of Russia we can now decide our stance regarding the rest of the world and how far-reaching our goals will be.
column13: Теперь, когда мы установили советскую власть в сердце России, мы должны определить наше отношение к остальному миру.

column2: We are happy with what we have.
column13: У нас есть все, что нужно

column2: All rightfull russian lands must be ours!
It is time to liberate the oppressed of Eurasia!
column13: Пришло время освободить всех угнетенных Евразии!

column2: Unable to cope with Russian oppression, the Siberian national assembly has declared its independence from Russia. Now that the days of the Russian government are numbered we must decide whether we should bring the revolution to Siberia or let them be for now?
We will free ALL Russian workers!

As expected, the situation in European Russia did take a turn for the worse. The country has collapsed and a new Communist revolution has begun. The Reds have refused to recognize us as a free nation and now we are faced with the necessity of defending ourselves against the Bolshevik threat.
If it's a war they want...

As expected, the situation in European Russia did take a turn for the worse. The country has collapsed and a new Communist revolution has begun. Luckily, the new Bolshevik leadership is more forgiving and Soviet Russia has agreed to recognize our independence.

Unable to cope with Russian oppression, the Siberian national assembly has declared its independance from Russia. Now that the days of the Russian government are numbered we must decide whether we should bring the revolution to Siberia or recognize their independence in exchange for their help?
We will free ALL Russian workers!
Recognize Siberia and offer them an alliance.
Ignore them, they will not last long.
column13: Игнорировать их. Это еще не конец

column2: As expected, the situation in European Russia did take a turn for the worse. The country has collapsed and a new Communist revolution has begun. The Reds have refused to recognize us as a free nation and now we are faced with the necessity of defending ourselves against the Bolshevik threat.
If it is war they want...

As expected, the situation in European Russia did take a turn for the worse. The country has collapsed and a new Communist revolution has begun. Luckily, the new Bolshevik leadership seems more than willing to compromise. They offer an official recognition of our independence in exchange for a coordinated effort in fighting the current Russian government.
Excellent, now we are not alone!
Refuse, the Bolsheviks aren't to be dealt with!
The Siberian government has agreed to join forces in the war against the Russian regime.
column13: Правительство Сибири согласилось объединить усилия в борьбе с российским режимом.

column2: The Siberian government has refused our generous offer to fight the oppressive Russian regime together. What shall we do?
column13: Сибирь отвергла наше щедрое предложение о совместной борьбе с российским режимом. Что мы предпримем?

column2: Let them be, their time will come!
If they aren't with us they're against us!
column13: Кто не с нами, тот против нас!

column2: Now that the Whites are defeated the government needs to decide whether it is safe to remain with the new Soviet regime. Should we sever our ties with them?
column13: Теперь, когда Белая Россия побеждена, правительство должно решить, безопасно ли сохранять союз с новым советским режимом или необходимо порвать все связи с ними.

column2: It is safer to stay on the winning side.
Now that the Revolution has succeeded, the treacherous leaders of Siberia have decided to abandon our cause.
column13: Теперь, когда революция победила, лицемерные лидеры Сибири покинули наш союз.

column2: Let them be, their time will come!
The areas of the former Cossack state are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
column13: Территории бывшего казачьего государства полностью интегрированы в нашу растущую социалистическую родину.

column2: With the rebellious state of Finland finally crushed by the glorious Red Army the time has come to decide its fate. Shall we reincorporate it once more into our motherland or shall we preserve Finnish independence under our supervision?
column13: Мятежное государство Финляндия уничтожено доблестной Красной армией и пришло время решить его судьбу. Мы можем снова присоединить его или предоставить независимость... под нашим присмотром, разумеется.

column2: The areas of the former state of Finland are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
column13: Территории бывшего капиталистического финского государства полностью интегрированы в нашу растущую социалистическую Родину.

column2: With Japan's puppet state Fengtien finally crushed by the glorious Red Army the time has come to decide its fate. Shall we reincorporate it once more into our motherland or shall we restore its independence under our supervision? Another course of action could be the establishment of a new order, not just in Manchuria but in China as a whole!
The areas of the former Japanese puppet state Fengtien are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
column13: Территория Маньчжурии успешно интегрирована в наше растущее государство.

column2: The areas of the former state of Alash-Orda are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
column13: Территории бывшего мятежного государства Алаш-Орда полностью интегрированы в нашу растущую социалистическую родину.

column2: With the North-Western China finally under our control, the time has come to decide its fate. Shall we reincorporate the eastern part of it, called Sinkiang, into our motherland or shall we restore its independence under our supervision? Another course of action could be the restoration of Xibei Lianbang Yiyuan.
Restore independent Sinkiang and the Huijang republic!
Integrate Sinkiang and liberate Huijang republic!
Integrate Sinkiang and allow China to occupy the rest!
Liberate Sinkiang and allow China to occupy the rest!
Allow China to occupy Xibei Lianbang Yiyuan!
Sinkiang, once part of the warlord state of Xibei Lianbang Yiyuan, is now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
column13: Синьцзян успешно интегрирован в нашу растущую социалистическую Родину.

column2: The areas of the former state of Turkestan are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
column13: Территории бывшего мятежного государства Туркестан полностью интегрированы в нашу растущую социалистическую родину.

column2: The areas of the former state of Primorsk are now firmly integrated into our growing motherland.
column13: Территории бывшего мятежного государства, Заамурья, полностью интегрированы в нашу растущую социалистическую родину.

column2: The areas once occupied by Mongolia are now firmly integrated into our growing motherland.
column13: Территории, ранее оккупированные Монголией, полностью интегрированы в нашу растущую социалистическую родину.

column2: With the rogue state of Mongolia finally crushed by the glorious Red Army the time has come to decide its fate. Shall we reincorporate it once more into our motherland or shall we preserve Mongolia's independence under our supervision?
column13: Доблестная Красная армия сокрушила мятежное монгольское государство и теперь пришло время решить его судьбу. Мы можем  включить Монголию в состав нашей страны или предоставить автономию.

column2: The areas of the former Mongolian state are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
column13: Территории бывшей Монголии полностью интегрированы в нашу растущую социалистическую родину.

column2: The areas of the artificial state of White Ruthenia, created by the German Empire to weaken Russia, are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
column13: Территории Белоруссии, искусственного государства, созданного Германией для ослабления России, полностью интегрированы в нашу растущую социалистическую родину.

column2: The areas of the artificial state of Ukraine, created by the German Empire to weaken Russia, are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
column13: Территории Украины, искусственного государства, созданного Германией для ослабления России, полностью интегрированы в нашу растущую социалистическую родину.

column2: The areas of the former state of Azerbaijan are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
column13: Территории бывшего мятежного государства Азербайджан полностью интегрированы в нашу растущую социалистическую родину.

column2: The areas of the former state of Armenia are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
column13: Территории бывшего мятежного государства Армения полностью интегрированы в нашу растущую социалистическую родину

column2: The areas of the former state of Georgia are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
column13: Территории бывшего мятежного государства Грузия полностью интегрированы в нашу растущую социалистическую родину

column2: The integration of United Baltic Duchy
The areas of the United Baltic Duchy, created by the German Empire to further weaken Russia, are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
column13: Территории Балтийского герцогства, искусственного государства, созданного Германией для ослабления России, полностью интегрированы в нашу растущую социалистическую родину.

column2: The areas of the former state of Lithuania are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
column13: Территории бывшего мятежного государства Литва полностью интегрированы в нашу растущую социалистическую родину.

column2: The region of Bessarabia, once unlawfully occupied by Romania, is now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
column13: Территория Бессарабии, ранее незаконно оккупированная Румынией, полностью интегрирована в нашу растущую социалистическую Родину.

column2: Eastern Galicia, once part of the Austro-Hungarian Empire, is now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
column13: Восточная Галиция, ранее часть Австро-Венгерской империи, полностью интегрирована в нашу растущую социалистическую родину.

column2: With the former state of Poland finally crushed by the glorious Red Army the time has come to decide its fate. Shall we reincorporate it once more into our motherland or shall we preserve Polish independence under our supervision?
column13: Доблестная Красная армия сокрушила мятежное польское государство и теперь пришло время решить его судьбу. Мы можем снова включить Польшу в состав нашей страны или предоставить автономию.

column2: The areas of the former Polish state are now firmly integrated into our growing socialist motherland.
column13: Территории бывшего польского государства полностью интегрированы в нашу растущую социалистическую родину.

column2: With the stabilization of our motherland we can now start looking beyond our borders. To the south lies the pseudo-capitalist Cossack state led by Hetman Krasnov. Soviet Marshal Budyonny has petitioned our government to instigate a coup in the Don-Kuban Union by using his significant influence amongst the Cossack population. Shall we offer him our support?

Soviet agitators, together with detachments of rebellious cossacks lead by Semyon Budyonny, have turned popular opinion against our regime. Russians, both in the countryside and in the cities, have rebelled. Chechens and Ingushens have also declared a jihad against our government. The country is in chaos. Can we resist the opposition?
The rebels take over the capital!

Today the new Hetman of Don-Kuban Union, Semyon Budyonny, met with our prime-minister and announced that the Don-Kuban Union will become an integral part of the new Russia. Our citizens are happy that marshal Budyonny has achieved a new victory. Glory to the new Red Cossacks!
Our attempt to replace the government in the Don-Kuban union with one loyal to our state failed miserably. What shall we do now?
column13: Наша попытка сместить правительство Доно-Кубанского Союза позорно провалилась. Как мы поступим?

column2: The Alash Orda's Russians are oppressed!

We have an excellent opportunity to expand our territories and further spread the ideals of Lenin. The leaders of Alash Orda's Russian community have complained to us that they are oppressed under the government's ethnic policies.
column13: У нас прекрасная возможность одновременно расширить нашу территорию и распространить ленинские идеалы. Представители русского населения Алаш-Орды пожаловались, что их права нарушаются этнической политикой этого государства.

column2: Encourage them to secede and rejoin Soviet Russia!
column13: Предложить им войти в состав Советской России

column2: Covert operations will be good enough.
Soviet Russia is stirring up seperatism!
The resurgent Soviet Russia is encouraging our ethnic Russian community to secede from our country and be incorporated into their state.  What shall we do?
column13: Возродившаяся Советская Россия убедила русскоязычные регионы нашей страны отделиться и присоединиться к ним. Что мы предпримем?

column2: We shall fight to maintain the integrity of our lands!
column13: Мы будет бороться за целостность нашей страны!

column2: Let them go but maintain our interests in the area.
column13: Пусть уходят, у нас есть дела поважнее
Северная часть Алаш-Орды присоединилась к нам!

column2: The prime-minister has announced that, following intense diplomatic pressure on the government of Alash-Orda, their northern areas were allowed to join Soviet Russia! A new grand victory for the Soviet state!
column13: Сегодня Михаил Фрунзе объявил, что благодаря нашему дипломатическому давлению на правительство Алаш-Орды северные территори этого государства присоединились к Советской России! Очередная великая победа нашей родины!

column2: The Alash Orda's Russians are oppressed!

The leaders of Alash Orda's Russian community have complained to us that they are oppressed under the government's ethnic policies. Such an insult to the Soviet people must not go unpunished! We can either immediately declare war upon them or try to use our existing contacts within certain political circles in Alash-Orda to stage a coup.
Encourage them to secede and rejoin Soviet Union!
column13: Предложить им войти в состав Советского Союза

column2: Covert operations will be good enough.
The Kazakhs have overstepped their bounds, this means war!
Soviet Union tried to accomplish a coup!

Soviet agitators, together with detachments of rebellious Russians led by Talgat Bigeldinov, have turned popular opinion against our regime. Russians, both in the countryside and in the cities have rebelled, leaving the entire country in chaos. How will the situation develop?
Our attempt to replace the government of Alash-Orda with one loyal to our state failed miserably. What shall we do now?
column13: Наша попытка сменить правительство Алаш-Орды на более лояльное позорно провалилась. Что мы предпримем?

column2: Revolution in Alash Orda was successful!
Members of SOVNARKOM are currently in the capital of the Syndicalist Republic of Alash Orda. Vyacheslav Molotov is holding a speech, where he states that...
column13: Члены Совнаркома прибыли в столицу Синдикалистской Республики Алаш-Орда. Вячеслав Молотов произнес речь по поводу того, что...

column2: ...Alash Orda will become part of the Soviet Union!
...Alash Orda will be an ally of the Soviet Union!
The Alash Orda's Russians are oppressed!
The leaders of Alash Orda's Russian community have complained to us that they are oppressed under the government's ethnic policies. Such an insult to the Soviet people must not go unpunished!
column13: Представители русского населения Алаш-Орды пожаловались, что их права нарушаются этнической политикой этого государства. Подобные оскорбления не могут оставаться безнаказанными!

column2: Encourage them to secede and rejoin the Soviet Republic!
column13: Предложить им войти в состав Советской республики

column2: World revolution, we must liberate them!
Covert operations will be good enough.

Michail Frunze observes a map of Central Asia in light of recent events. A series of border incidents has drawn Central Asia into armed conflict. Should Soviet Russia use this opportunity to liberate the workers and peasants of Central Asia?
column13: Михаил Фрунзе по новому смотрит на карту Средней Азии в свете недавних тревожных событий. Серия пограничных инцидентов погрузила Среднюю Азию в пучину войны. Использует ли Советская Россия эту возможность для освобождения рабочих и крестьян Средней Азии?

column2: We have no interests in Central Asia.

Members of SOVNARKOM are concerned about the unstable situation near our southern borders which may prove detrimental to the development of our southern regions. Armed forces of Alash-Orda and Turkestan are currently locked in a deadly struggle against each other with each nation having clear intentions to dominate Central Asia. This presents us with an opportunity to further spread the ideals of Lenin and bring stability back to Central Asia.
We have no interests in Central Asia.

Marshal Tukhachevsky and his staff are considering the next course of action in order to bring Syndicalism to the entire world. Central Asia is still dominated by religious fanatics based in Turkestan and bourgeois traitors in Alash-Orda with both states locked in a fight to the death. This presents us with an opportunity to further spread the ideals of Lenin and bring stability back to Central Asia.
We have no interests in Central Asia.

Horrible news! A train full of Soviet citizens has been massacred by bandits on the Mongolian section of the Trans-Siberian railway! Our people are shocked by this act of barbarism and demand an immediate response from the government. Baron Ungern von Sternberg, Supreme Khan of All Mongols, is getting stronger. This might be the perfect opportunity to stop his wild and savage men.
We demand full sovereignity over OUR Trans-Siberian railway!
We shall bring civilization where there is barbarism, send the troops!
column13: Россия принесет цивилизацию этим варварам! Отправить войска!

column2: We must increase the security on our trains.
Soviet Russia demands full control over the railroad
column13: Советская Россия требует полного контроля над Транссибом

column2: After a train carrying Soviet citizens was attacked by bandits on our section of the Trans-Siberian railway the Soviet government has demanded full control over the railway. Soviet Russia is an increasingly powerful country and it is doubtful whether we could win in any confrontation with them.
We shall abandon our portion of the railroad.
column13: Мы должны отказаться от нашего участка железной дороги

column2: Baron Ungern von Sternberg has responded to our demands: one hundred ethnic Russians have been executed in Ulaan Baator as a warning for us not to meddle in Mongolian affairs. He has also asserted Mongolia's historic right to Siberia. How should we react?
column13: Разгневанный нашими требованиями барон приказал казнить сотню русских в Урге в качестве предупреждения. Также он заявил, что Сибирь по праву должна принадлежать Монголии. Как мы поступим?

column2: Unacceptable, we shall wipe Mongolia from the map!
Evacuate all Russian citizens from Mongolia and seal the border!
column13: Эвакуировать наших граждан из Монголии и закрыть границу

column2: After a train carrying Soviet citizens was attacked by bandits on our section of the Trans-Siberian railway the Soviet government used its wide array of contacts, namely general Sukhbaatar and his lackeys, to instigate rebellion against our rightful government. How will the situation evolve?
The revolution in Mongolia is successful
With aid from the soviet intelligence general Sukhbaatar and his lackeys we were able to overthrow Sternberg and take power in Mongolia!
column13: При помощи советской разведки генерал Сухэ-Батор со своими товарищами сверг Штернберга и захватил власть в Монголии!

column2: Another victory for the Soviet intelligence service!
Our attempt to replace the government of Mongolia with one loyal to our state failed miserably. What shall we do now?
column13: Наша попытка заменить правительство Монголии на более лояльное с треском провалилась. Что мы предпримем?

column2: Horrible news!  A train full of Russian citizens has been massacred by bandits on the Mongolian section of the Trans-Siberian railway! Our people are shocked by this act of barbarism and demand an immediate response from the government. Baron Ungern von Sternberg, Supreme Khan of All Mongols, is getting stronger. This might be the best opportunity to stop this wild and savage man.
We shall bring civilization where there is barbarism, send the troops!
column13: Россия принесет цивилизацию этим варварам! Отправить войска!

column2: Enough, we demand full sovereignity over OUR Trans-Siberian railway!
We must increase the security on our trains.

Horrible news! A train full of Russian citizens has been massacred by bandits on the Mongolian section of the Trans-Siberian railroad! Our people are shocked by this act of barbarism and demand an immediate response from the government. Baron Ungern von Sternberg, Supreme Khan of All Mongols, is getting stronger. This might be the perfect opportunity to stop this wild and savage man.
We shall bring civilization where there is barbarism, send the troops!
column13: Россия принесет цивилизацию этим варварам! Отправить войска!

column2: Enough, we demand full sovereignity over OUR Trans-Siberian railway!
We must increase the security on our trains.

Since 1920 the right bank of the Amur river is in the hands of Japan and its lackeys. Now, our Soviet state is finally strong enough to retake our rightful territory. But there are different opinions on how we will liberate this territory. The NKVD wants to start a coup while army leaders just want to send the troops to Vladivostok.
Contact the People`s Far East Party, they will help us plan a coup.
column13: Связаться с Дальневосточной народной партией, она поможет с переворотом.

column2: Send the troops to Vladivostok to dissolve Transamur!
The People`s Far East Party coup!

Transamur Syndicalists, supported by Soviet bolsheviks, went to the streets. They are trying to overthrow our rightful government and replace it with this Syndicalist monstrosity. Members of the People`s Far East Party as well as revolutionary parts of our population are trying to take control of Vladivostok. We have already sent for the troops to help us contain this revolution, will the armed forces remain loyal to us?
The armed forces stay loyal, this 'revolution' is crushed!

Following the re-establishment of Soviet control over the Trans-Siberian Railway the Soviets have decided to enlist the support of some rebellious Transamurian Syndicalists in order to establish control over the Primorsk territory by force! Can we afford to oppose an increasingly powerful Soviet state for the sake of Transamur or should we concentrate on greener pastures?
The Transamur Syndicalists were killed by the Transamur army. Our military is demanding that we send an army to Transamur. What will the political leaders of the Soviet state say?
column13: Синдикалисты Заамурья уничтожены армией. Наши военные требуют послать в Заамурье наши войска. Какое решение примут советские лидеры?

column2: Facing the threat of Soviet military force and deprived of the support of the local capitalists and the Japanese the Transamur government is ready to collapse in the face of popular will. We can now do what we like with Transamur but it has been independent for a long time and will be difficult to integrate into our country. Perhaps some sort of compromise is needed?
No compromise, put the leadership on trial and incorporate Transamur!
column13: Никаких компромиссов - отдать правительство под суд и присоединить Заамурье

column2: Administer Transamur as an autonomous zone.
column13: Дать Заамурью статус автономной области. На какое-то время...

column2: Soviet Russia has managed to establish its control over the Transamur Republic. Their prime-minister has arrived in Vladivostok. Can we accept this diminishment of the Co-prosperity Sphere?
column13: Советская Россия установила контроль над Заамурской Республикой. Михаил Фрунзе прибыл во Владивосток. Как мы отреагируем на вторжение в Сферу взаимного процветания?

column2: They're just reclaiming their own land...
column13: По правде говоря эти земли принадлежат им...

column2: We shall keep an eye on Transamur.
How dare they insult Japan like this!? Attack!
The Soviet Union has managed to establish its control over the Transamur Republic. Members of SOVNARKOM have arrived in Vladivostok. Can we accept this diminishment of the Co-prosperity Sphere?
column13: Советская Россия установила контроль над Заамурской Республикой. Члены Совнаркома прибыли во Владивосток. Как мы отреагируем на вторжение в Сферу взаимного процветания?

column2: They're just reclaiming their own land...
column13: По правде говоря эти земли принадлежат им...

column2: We shall keep an eye on Transamur, federalists are dangerous.
How dare they insult Japan like this!? Attack!
The Soviet Republic has managed to establish its control over the Transamur Republic. Their prime-minister has arrived in Vladivostok. Can we accept this diminishment of the Co-prosperity Sphere?
column13: Советская Россия установила контроль над Заамурской Республикой. Маршал Тухачевский прибыл во Владивосток. Как мы отреагируем на вторжение в Сферу взаимного процветания?

column2: They're just reclaiming their own land...
column13: По правде говоря эти земли принадлежат им...

column2: We shall keep an eye on Transamur. Their ideas of world revolution are too dangerous.
column13: Приглядывать за Заамурьем, их теория мировой революции слишком опасна.

column2: How dare they insult Japan like this!? Attack!
We have lost control of our continental provinces. Now our homeland is directly threatened. Maybe we could appease the Soviets by offering them Korea, Port Arthur, Sakhalin and the Kuril Islands.
column13: Мы потеряли контроль над нашими территориями на континенте. Теперь под угрозой находится непосредственно наша родина. Возможно, мы успокоим Советы, передав им Корею, Порт-Артур, Сахалин и Курильские острова.

column2: After we conquered their continental provinces Japan, fearing the might of our armed forces, begs for peace.  They're offering us Korea, Port Arthur, Sakhalin and the Kuril Islands in exchange for the cessation of hostilities between our states.
column13: Мы захватили все владения Японии на континенте. Япония испугалась мощи нашей армии и просит мира. Они предлагают нам Корею, Порт-Артур, Сахалин и Курильские острова в обмен на прекращение военных действий.

column2: Now it is time to fullfill our conditions.
The Korean people have suffered for a very long time under the Japanese regime. It is now in our power to grant them their desired independence, is this in accordance with our plans?
column13: Корейский народ долгое время страдал от японского угнетения. В нашей власти предоставить им независимость, если это совпадает с нашими планами...

column2: Keep it under our direct control.
We have decided that it would be in our best interest if an independent Korea emerges on the world map. How much independence will it really have?
column13: Мы решили, что полезно будет позволить Корее снова появиться на карте мира. Но насколько независима она будет?

column2: After our defeat in the First Russo-Japanese War of 1905 we had to relinquish Port Arthur to the Japanese empire. Now it is under our control once again.
column13: После поражения в первой русско-японской войне 1905 года Россия передала Порт-Артур Японской империи. Теперь он вновь под нашим контролем

column2: After the Russians beat the Japanese they gained control of Port Arthur. They have decided that they have no more use for it and instead have given it to us.
column13: После победы над японцами русские получили контроль над Порт-Артуром. Теперь Россия предлагает вернуть его нам.

column2: The Soviet state has launched a succesful invasion of our country and there is nothing we can do to stop their relentless advance. Most of our commanders suggest that we offer the Soviets an unconditional surrender to prevent more useless deaths.
column13: Советское государство успешно провело вторжение в нашу страну и мы не можем остановить их безжалостное наступление. Большинство генералов выступают за капитуляцию, пока нас всех не уничтожили...

column2: After our troops reached Mukden the Fengtien republic was forced to sign an unconditional surrender.
column13: Сразу после захвата Мукдена Фэнтяньская Республика согласилась на безоговорочную капитуляцию.

column2: The Soviet state has launched a succesful invasion of our country and there is nothing we can do to stop their relentless advance. Most of our commanders suggest that we offer the Soviets an unconditional surrender to prevent more useless deaths.
column13: Советское государство успешно провело вторжение в нашу страну и мы не можем остановить их безжалостное наступление. Большинство генералов выступают за капитуляцию, пока нас всех не уничтожили...

column2: Kolchak realized that further resistance against us was hopeless. He was left no other choice but to sign the unconditional surrender of his rebellious state.
column13: Колчак осознал, что дальнейшее сопротивление его псевдогосударства безнадежно. У него нет другого выбора, кроме согласия на безоговорочную капитуляцию.

column2: We have finally seized control of the Mongolian capital! How shall we deal with these savage barbarians?
column13: Мы захватили столицу Монголии! Как мы поступим с этими жестокими дикарями?

column2: Let the Mongols join us on OUR terms!
column13: Пусть они присоединятся к нам... на наших условиях!

column2: Make an example of them, unconditional surrender!
The Mongols fold to our demands!
Our alliance with Baron von Sternberg and Mongolia ended in disaster! The self-proclaimed Khan has ended up as a Soviet puppet, there's nothing to gain for us in this conflict.
column13: Наш союз с Бароном фон Штернбергом и Монголией привел к катастрофе! Теперь, когда самопровозглашенный хан стал советской марионеткой, для нас нет никакой выгоды в продолжении войны.

column2: Apparently the rogue Baron is more important to the Mongols than a dignified defeat!
column13: По видимому монголам важнее безумный барон, чем достойный мир!

column2: The wretched Russians have seized our glorious capital! Defeat seems certain, is it time to submit?
column13: Проклятые русские заняли нашу прекрасную столицу! Поражение кажется неизбежным, не должны ли мы сдаться?

column2: We have no choice but to submit.
The Baron shall lead us to victory or death!

The Tuvan people are Turks that live next to the Mongols and they have played an important function in Sternberg's empire. Upon hearing of the collapse of his regime the Tuvans are demanding freedom. Granting them this wish would greatly weaken the Mongols.
Order Mongolia to release Tannu Tuva!
column13: Отправить требование монголам, чтобы освободили тувинцев!

column2: They are still Mongols for all we care!

The Tuvan people are Turks that live next to the Mongols and they have played an important function in Sternberg's empire. Upon hearing of the collapse of his regime the Tuvans are demanding freedom. Granting them this wish would greatly weaken the Mongols.
Give the Tuvans total freedom, once and for all!
Give the Tuvans freedom, but they shall remain loyal to us!
column13: Дать тувинцам свободу, но обеспечит зависимость от нас!

column2: The Soviets have sent us an ultimatum to release the Tuvans!
column13: Советы предъявили нам ультиматум с требованием об освобождении Тувы!

column2: The Tuvans are now free, and at our disposal!
column13: Тува теперь свободна, и находится под нашим присмотром!

column2: The Russians have sent us an ultimatum to secede Tannu Tuva to them!
column13: Русские прислали нам ультиматум, требуя чтобы мы передали им Туву!

column2: During the Russian civil war many rightful Russian lands were occupied by the Kingdom of Finland. The subsequent German intervention in the Russian civil war allowed Finland to keep those territories. Now that the attention of the German empire is turned westwards we can finally focus on regaining Karelia. We can either try to solve this matter diplomatically or use this opportunity as a pretext to finally integrate Finland into our state.

Today, Vyacheslav Molotov has met with our Prime-Minister and announced that the Soviet state wants to take back Vyborg and a part of Karelia. They are offering us monetary and material compensation as well as a guarantee of the future state borders in return. How shall we react?
The Kingdom of Finland has refused our generous offer to transfer Vyborg and a part of Karelia back to the motherland! We must take back our rightful lands by force!
column13: Финляндское королевство отклонило наше щедрое предложение о возвращении Выборга и части Карелии нашему государству! Мы должны забрать свои земли силой!

column2: The Kingdom of Finland has agreed to transfer larger parts of Karelia in return for monetary and material compensation as well as the guaranteed security of their new borders!
column13: Финляндское королевство согласилось передать нам большую часть Карелии в обмен на денежную компенсацию и гарантии неприкосновенности новой границы!

column2: Armed forces of the Soviet state have inflicted a series of great defeats upon us. We must end this war before they manage to overrun our entire homeland!
column13: Советская армия нанесла нам серию тяжелых поражений. Мы должны прекратить эту войну, пока не потеряли всю страну...

column2: With the reconquest of Karelia the government of Finland have declared their desire to end the war between our nations, accepting our sovereignty over the entirety of Karelia in the process. How shall we react?
column13: После занятия нами Карелии, правительство Финляндии объявило о желании закончить войну между нашими странами, признав наш суверенитет над Карелией. Как мы отреагируем?

column2: The Soviet state has agreed to our offer of surrender and the state of war is finally over...
column13: Советы приняли наше предложение и война, наконец, окончена...
По крайней мере, наше государство еще существует!

column2: Armed forces of the Soviet state have managed to revert the injustices imposed on us during the Russian Civil War. The entire nation celebrates this enormous victory!
column13: Наши вооруженные силы добились победы! Вся страна празднует эту удивительную победу!

column2: The Soviet state recapturing positions in the Caucasus, previously held by the Russian Empire, has led to a rise of Arabian nationalism originating from Egypt and Hashemite Arabia. Our state and its foreign interests are in grave danger. We must quickly stabilise our eastern borders if we hope to survive the approaching struggle with the hostile Arabian states. The Sultan is planning to send Prince Nihad to propose a non-aggression treaty with the Soviet state.

column13: Пакт о ненападении с Османской империей

column2: Our recent achievments in the Caucasus, namely the incorporation of Georgia, greatly disturbed the Ottoman Empire. Prince Nihad recently arrived into our capital with the proposal of a non-aggression pact between our nations in which either side recognizes the current borders between the Ottoman Empire and the Soviet state. How shall we respond to this proposal?
We need security too, sign the Pact!
column13: Нам тоже нужна безопасность. Подписать пакт!

column2: Include Armenia to sweeten the deal!
Non-Agression pact with Soviets was signed
The airplane of Prince Nihad recently landed in Istanbul. The Prince announced that the non-aggression pact with the Soviet government was signed. The eastern border of our empire is now secure!
column13: Самолет принца Нихада только что совершил посадку в Стамбуле. Принц объявил, что пакт успешно подписан. Наша восточная граница в безопасности!

column2: A grand success of Ottoman diplomacy!
The Soviet state agrees to sign the pact but they demand the inclusion of our buffer-state Armenia into the deal so that it falls in the Soviet sphere of influence.
column13: Советское государство согласно подписать договор, но они требуют включения буферного государства Армения в свою сферу влияния.

column2: The non-aggression pact with the Ottomans was signed
column13: Подписан пакт о ненападении с Османской империей

column2: The Ottoman Empire has agreed to include Armenia into our sphere of influence. We have succesfully eliminated the probability of war with the Ottoman Empire, thus freeing our hands to deal with more serious threats to our security in the process. It`s a grand success of Soviet diplomacy!

Thanks to our masterful diplomacy the Armenian state now belongs to our sphere of influence. Now we have to decide our stance towards them. We can either try to establish our control over their government or integrate the entire Armenian state into our motherland.
Try to establish control over the Armenian government!

Secret negotiations between the Ottoman Empire and the Soviet state resulted in our state becoming a part of the Soviet sphere of influence. Now the Soviet state has issued a number of demands towards our state which, if accepted, will result in our incorporation into the Soviet state. Efforts to resist the powerful Soviet state without international backing seem futile.
Seeing no other options the Armenian leadership has accepted our demands
column13: У Армении нет другого выбора и они приняли наше предложение

column2: The mad Armenian leadership rejected our rightful demands. How shall we react to this insolence?
column13: Сумасшедшее правительство Армении отказалось принять наши справедливые требования. Как мы отреагируем на такую наглость?

column2: Secret negotiations between the Ottoman Empire and the Soviet state resulted in our state becoming a part of the Soviet sphere of influence. Now the Soviet state issued a number of demands with regards to our constitutional system which, if accepted, will mean the end of Armenia as an independent state. Efforts to resist the powerful Soviet state without international backing seem futile.
Seeing no other options the Armenian leadership has accepted all our demands with regards to their constitutional system.
column13: У Армении нет другого выбора и они приняли наше предложение

column2: Now that the state of Don-Kuban no longer exists we must choose our stance towards the independent state of Georgia. We can either try to bring them into the fold using the threat of military power or via more subtle ways of negotiation. Another option is to create an independent military bloc with Georgia. What shall we do?

The increasingly powerful Soviet state has once again set its sights on the Caucasus. Now the Soviet state issued a number of demands towards our state which, if accepted, will result in our incorporation into the Soviet state. Efforts to resist the powerful Soviet state without international backing seem futile.
Seeing no other options the Georgian leadership accepted our demands.
column13: Не имея другого выбора, Грузия приняла наши предложения

column2: The mad Georgian leadership rejected our rightful demands. How shall we react to this insolence?
column13: Правители Грузии сошли с ума! Они отклонили наши законные требования. Как мы отреагируем на это оскорбление?

column2: The increasingly powerful Soviet state has once again set its sights on the Caucasus. Now the Soviet state displayed its willingness to negotiate with our state on terms of our peaceful reintegration into the Soviet state. How shall we respond?
column13: Могущественное советское государство вернулось на Кавказ. Оно хочет провести с нашей страной переговоры об условиях мирного присоединения. Что мы ответим?

column2: Agree, but Beria must have role in the Soviet government!
column13: Мы согласны, но Берия пойдет в правительство.

column2: Beria has decided to agree with our demands and will allow his country to become incorporated into our motherland if he is given the post of Foreign minister of the Soviet state as part of a compromise.
column13: Берия согласится с нашими требованиями о присоединении своей страны к нашей Родине, если мы предоставим ему пост наркома иностранных дел в нашем правительстве.

column2: What is this lunacy? Send in the troops!
The Soviet state offers us an alliance!
The Soviets have sent word that they consider our two states to be alike and that we should ally to promote the global cause of labour. What should we do?
column13: Советы заявили, что считают наши государства похожими и предложили объединить усилия в общей борьбе трудовых народов. Что мы ответим?

column2: We cannot trust the treacherous Soviets!
A new power in the east!
The government of Georgia has accepted our offer and now a new power in the east is born. With such a powerful alliance emerging on the global stage the future of the proletariat looks promising.
column13: Правительство Грузии приняло наше предложение. С появлением нового сильного альянса будущее пролетариата выглядит многообещающе...

column2: In their arrogance the government of Georgia has turned down our gracious offer, saying that the ideological rift between us is too great for an alliance to form. How shall we react to this humiliation?
column13: Высокомерное правительство Грузии отклонило наше предложение,заявив, что идеологическая пропасть между нами слишком велика для заключения союза. Как мы отреагируем на это оскорбление?

column2: They will pay for their foolishness!

Growing tensions between the German Empire and the Commune of France has erupted into a full scale war. This armed conflict presents us with the perfect opportunity to reclaim the territories in Eastern Europe that we lost due to the treaty of Brest-Litovsk as well as the option to spread the proletarian revolution!
We must join arms with France!
We must reorganize our own country.
The Soviets want to join the Internationale!
The Soviet state expressed its intention to join our alliance. For the world revolution!
column13: Советское государство выразило свое намерение присоединиться к нашему союзу во имя мировой революции!

column2: The areas once occupied by Mountainous Republic of the Northern Caucasus are now firmly integrated into our growing motherland.

With the stabilization of our motherland we can now start looking beyond our borders. To the south lies the pseudo-capitalist Mountain republic led by Caucasian nationalists. Ali Mitayev, the Chechen sheikh from the Mountainous republic has petitioned our government to instigate a coup in the Mountain Republic by using his significant influence amongst local population. Shall we offer him our support ?

Soviet agitators, together with detachments of rebellious mountaineers lead by Ali Mitayev, have turned part of popular opinion against our regime. Russians, both in the countryside and in the cities, have rebelled. The country is in chaos. Can we resist the opposition ?
The rebels take over the capital!

Today the new Head of state of Mountain republic, Ali Mitayev, met with our prime-minister and announced that the Mountain republic will become an integral part of the new Russia. Our citizens are celebrating resotration of the Russian authority over Caucasus.
Our attempt to replace the government in the Mountain republic with one loyal to our state failed miserably. What shall we do now?

Recent reassurgence of the Soviet state in the east together with recent soviet diplomatic activity through the eastern Europe proves, that in order to keep our state, its independence and its borders intact, we need to gain protection of German Empire and Mitteleuropa alliance. Hovewer doing will mean definite military involvement of our state in any potential conflict in the western europe and may further worsen our relations with Soviet Russia. What shall we do ?

Government of Commonwealth, afraid of recent agressive soviet foreign policy has annouced recently that they want to join Mitteleuropa alliance. It's not a sudden move because pro-German policy is popular in many circles including the ruling cabinet and army. Do we want to allow Commonwealth to join our alliance and protect them from potential Bolshevik diplomatic and economical offensive ?
Guarantee their independence, but nothing more.
Stable relationship with Russia is more important.
column13: Хорошие отношения с Россией более важны

column2: Germans accepted our offer and invited us into Mitteleuropa alliance. Now our independence and territorial integrity are protected by powerfull German armed forces.

Recent reassurgence of the Soviet state in the east together with recent soviet diplomatic activity through the eastern Europe proves, that in order to keep our state, its independence and its borders intact, we need to gain protection of German Empire and Mitteleuropa alliance. Hovewer doing will mean definite military involvement of our state in any potential conflict in the western europe and may further worsen our relations with Soviet Russia. What shall we do ?

Government of Poland, afraid of recent agressive soviet foreign policy has annouced recently that they want to join Mitteleuropa alliance. It's not a sudden move because pro-German policy is popular in many circles including the ruling cabinet and army. Do we want to allow Poland to join our alliance and protect them from potential Bolshevik diplomatic and economical offensive ?
Guarantee their independence, but nothing more.
Stable relationship with Russia is more important.
column13: Хорошие отношения с Россией более важны

column2: Germans accepted our offer and invited us into Mitteleuropa alliance. Now our independence and territorial integrity are protected by powerfull German armed forces.

Recent reassurgence of the Soviet state in the east together with recent soviet diplomatic activity through the eastern Europe proves, that in order to keep our state, its independence and its borders intact, we need to gain protection of German Empire and Mitteleuropa alliance. Hovewer doing will mean definite military involvement of our state in any potential conflict in the western europe and may further worsen our relations with Soviet Russia. What shall we do ?

Government of Finland, afraid of recent agressive soviet foreign policy has annouced recently that they want to join Mitteleuropa alliance. It's not a sudden move because pro-German policy is popular in many circles including the ruling cabinet and army. Do we want to allow Finland to join our alliance and protect them from potential Bolshevik diplomatic and economical offensive ?
Guarantee their independence, but nothing more.
Stable relationship with Russia is more important.
column13: Хорошие отношения с Россией более важны

column2: Germans accepted our offer and invited us into Mitteleuropa alliance. Now our independence and territorial integrity are protected by powerfull German armed forces.

The Russian government has proven itself unable to maintain the security of its Siberian territories. We have received word that many local leaders want to secede and join Transamur! There may be international complications but we may never get another opportunity like this!
Claim the land up to Lake Baikal!
Ask the Japanese Empire for permission.

The growing instability in Russia was viewed by the leadership of Transamur as an excellent opportunity to finally take control over Eastern Siberia. An official diplomatic representative from Transamur has come to us seeking permission to use force against Russia if they resist their rightful demands regarding Siberia.

Transamur has taken advantage of the unrest in Siberia to establish its control over the region. While this is a great infringement on our sovereignty we are currently very weak and may not be able to win a war to reclaim our lands, especially since fighting Transamur may mean fighting Japan as well.
It is useless to fight over an icy wasteland.
column13: Нет смысла сражаться за ледяную пустыню, передать эти земли

column2: What!? Siberia shall always belong to Russia!
column13: Что? Сибирь всегда будет принадлежать России!

column2: Transamur has taken advantage of the unrest in Siberia to establish its control over the region. While this is a great infringement on our sovereignty, we are currently very weak in the Far East and can not hope to win a war to reclaim our lands, especially since we are still caught up in a deadly civil war.

Our client state, the Transamur Republic, has established its control over parts of Siberia. While this is a fine addition to the Co-Prosperity Sphere it is possible that Transamur is becoming too powerful and needs to be restrained.
column13: Наш проекторат, Заамурская республика, установил контроль над частью Сибири. Это хорошение дополнение к Сфере взаимного процветания, но не исключено, что со своими амбициями, Колчак слишком усилится.

column2: Demand Kamchatka and bases in the Sea of Okhotsk!
column13: Потребовать Камчатку и базы в Охотском море

column2: It is good to have strong client states!
column13: Это хорошо, что наш проекторат сильное государство

column2: Kolchak is too greedy for his own good, it is time to replace him.

The Japanese have congratulated us on our seizure of Siberia but the Representative of the Mikado states that we should allow Japan to administer Kamchatka and allow them to establish a naval base in the Sea of Okhotsk.
column13: Японцы поздравили нас с захватом Сибири, но потребовали Камчатку и военно-морскую базу в Охотском море.

column2: Yes, we still need Japanese protection.
column13: Да, мы по прежнему нуждаемся в японской защите

column2: It is time to throw off the Japanese yoke!
The Japanese are trying to remove Admiral Kolchak!

The Japanese believe Kolchak has outlived his usefulness and have approached the elite of Transamur with the plan of backing a coup d'etat to replace him with a more pliant council of business and military leaders.
column13: Японцы считают, что Колчак стал бесполезен, и предложили элите Заамурья совершить государственные переворот, чтобы на его сменил совет военных и бизнесменов.

column2: Yes, Kolchak is mad and should be removed!
Kolchak is the Mighty Lord of the East, he stays here!
The Transamur Republic has taken great offence at our attempts to regulate their internal affairs and are severing all political ties with us!
column13: Заамурье отказалось принять наши требования, заявив что это их внутренние дела, а также разорвали все политические связи с нами!

column2: We can only let them go...

For a time during the Civil War Kolchak was the Supreme Ruler of All Siberia, one step away from rulership of all the Russias. Now that Siberia is in a state of rebellion against Russia this could be an opportunity to reassert the Admiral's claims over the weak rebellious government in Novosibirsk.
We should take this opportunity to attack Siberia!
column13: Мы должны воспользоваться этой возможностью для атаки

column2: Ask the Japanese Empire for permission.
Demand that they cede us the land up to lake Baikal!
Not yet, we are still building up Transamur...

The growing instability in Russia was viewed by the leadership of Transamur as an excellent opportunity to finally take control over Eastern Siberia. An official diplomatic representative of Transamur has come to us seeking permission to use force against the rebellious government of Siberia if they resist their rightful demands.
We have obtained permission from our Japanese overlords and we are free to proceed with our plans regarding Siberia.
column13: Получив разрешение Японии мы можем предпринять любые действия в отношении Сибири.

column2: Demand that they cede us the land up to lake Baikal!
Transamur will dominate Siberia, march on!
column13: Да, Колчак Верховный правитель всей Сибири! Атаковать!

column2: Ignore them, they will not last.
Transamur has sent troops and political specialists into Eastern Siberia, asserting their claim to rulership over the eastern parts of our state. What shall we do?
Let them take Eastern Siberia, we must keep our autonomy.
Siberia offers positions in their goverment
Our request for the eastern part of Siberia was met with a counteroffer from Siberia in which they promise to become our protectorate in exchange for the recognition of their independence.
column13: Сибирь выдвинула контрпредложение. Сибирь призанет наш протекторат над ней, в обмен на признание из независимости.

column2: It is too risky to overstretch ourselves...
The government of Transamur, unsatisfied with our offer, has instead demanded we submit to their authority immediately or face war! What shall we do?
Let us unite under one leader!
Siberia denies our claim of authority!
The insolent Siberian government has refused to accept direct rule from us, many of our officials are calling for a war against the 'heretical' state.
Transamur will dominate Siberia, march on!
column13: Да, Колчак Верховный правитель всей Сибири! Атаковать!

column2: Let's not focus on those whelps
Seeing no other options the leadership of Siberia has accepted all our demands.
According to the treaty we have signed with Transamur Siberia will recognize Transamur as a protector in exchange for their recognition of our independence.
column13: В соответствии с подписанным договором, Сибирь признает Заамурье своим защитником в обмен на признание независимости.

column2: With the Transamur domination over Siberia complete some members of our government think that the time is right for the integration of Siberia into Transamur. It would be quite easy to pass a series of laws which would ensure that the region is more firmly integrated into Transamur.
It is time for Transamur to directly rule over Siberia!
Vast areas of Siberia are now firmly integrated into our state!
With Transamur gaining control over Siberia maybe the time is right to move our capital into the hinterland in order to limit Japanese influence. Where should we go?
Transamur tries to escape our influence!

With the recent reconquest of Siberia by Transamur they have become much bolder, trying to forge their own way under the sun. Recently they have moved their capital from Vladivostok to more remote parts of their republic, a clear attempt to minimize our influence. What shall we do?
It is good to have strong allies!
Try to restore our influence over Transamur!
The Japanese are trying to subdue us!

The Japanese feel threatened by our attempts to minimize their influence over our country and they have issued an ultimatum to us in which they demand the cessation of steps threatening their sphere of prosperity.
column13: Японцы расценили наши попытки минимизации их влияния на нашу страну как угрозу и предъявили нам ультиматум, в котором требуют прекращения попыток выйти из сферы взаимного процветания. В случае нашего отказа нам угрожают страшными последствиями...

column2: The Transamur Republic has taken great offence at our attempts to regulate their internal affairs and are severing all political ties with us!
column13: Заамурье отказалось принять наши требования, заявив что это их внутренние дела, а также разорвали все политические связи с нами!

column2: We can only let them go...
With Siberia firmly integrated into our growing state we can now move further towards our ultimate goal, the restoration of the Russian state in its full glory.
We have finally seized control of the Mongolian capital! How shall we deal with these barbarians?
column13: Мы взяли под контроль столицу Монголии! Что будем делать с этими варварами?

column2: Let the Mongols join us on OUR terms!
column13: Пусть они присоединятся к нам... на наших условиях!

column2: Make an example of them, unconditional surrender!
The wretched Russians have siezed our glorious capital! Defeat seems near, is it time to submit?
column13: Проклятые русские захватили нашу прекрасную столицу! Поражение кажется неизбежным, не должны ли мы сдаться?

column2: We have no choice but to submit...
column13: У нас нет иного выбора, кроме как сдаться...

column2: The Baron shall lead us to victory or death!
The Mongols fold to our demands!
Our alliance with Baron von Sternberg and Mongolia ended in disaster! After the self-proclaimed Khan has ended as a Transamur puppet there's nothing to gain for us in this conflict.
Apparently the rogue Baron is more important to the Mongols than a dignified defeat!
column13: По видимому монголам важнее безумный барон, чем достойный мир!

column2: The Tuvan people are Turks that live next to the Mongols and they have played an important function in Sternberg's empire. Upon hearing about the collapse of his power the Tuvans are demanding freedom. Granting them this wish would greatly weaken the Mongols.
Order Mongolia to release Tannu Tuva!
column13: Отправить требование монголам, чтобы освободили тувинцев!

column2: Tannu Tuva will be Russian once more!
They are still Mongols for all we care!

The Tuvan people are Turks that live next to the Mongols and they have played an important function in Sternberg's empire. Upon hearing about the collapse of his power the Tuvans are demanding freedom. Granting them this wish would greatly weaken the Mongols.
Give the Tuvans total freedom, once and for all!
Give the Tuvans freedom, but they shall remain loyal to us!
column13: Дать тувинцам свободу, но обеспечит зависимость от нас!

column2: Tannu Tuva will be Russian once more!
The Russians have sent us an ultimatum to release the Tuvans!
column13: Русские прислали нам ультиматум, требуя чтобы мы освободили тувинцев!

column2: The Government of Transamur have sent us an ultimatum to release the Tuvans!
The Tuvans are now free and at our disposal!
column13: Тувинцы теперь свободны, и под нашим контролем!

column2: Aleksander Kolchak, leader of Transamur for more than 12 years, was overthrown by members of the general staff led by Sergei Wojciechowski and was executed by a firing squad. His death opens the field for various possiblities of political change in Transamur including the declaration of a republic, if Sergei Wojciechowski and his staff allows it.
Sergei Wojciechowski is the new leader of Transamur!

Admiral Kolchak, the long term leader of the Transamur state has been overthrown and assasinated by members of his own general staff. This was used by the democratic opposition to gain control over the state, effectively turning Transamur from a military junta into a democracy. How shall we react?
Demand the restoration of a military cabinet!
The Japanese are trying to destroy our republic!
The Japanese feel threatened by the sudden restoration of democracy in Transamur and they have issued an ultimatum to us in which they demand the restoration of a military cabinet.
column13: Японцы расценили внезапное восстановление демократии в Заамурье как угрозу и предъявили нам ультиматум, в котором требуют возвращения военного правительства. В случае нашего отказа нам угрожают страшными последствиями...

column2: The Transamur Republic has taken great offence at our attempts to regulate their internal affairs and are severing all political ties with us!
column13: Заамурье отказалось принять наши требования, заявив что это их внутренние дела, а также разорвали все политические связи с нами!

column2: We can only let them go...
We have successfuly reclaimed the European parts of Russia and we can now restore the Russian republic to its true glory!
column13: Мы успешно захватили европейскую часть России и можем восстановить Российскую республику во всем ее блеске!

column2: Either of Russia's historic capitals could become the home of our government. Where should we go?
column13: Наше правительство может разместится в любой из исторических столиц. Какой город мы выберем?

column2: After several months of preparations the provisional government has completed the arrangements for the first free election in Transamur since 1920. There are 90 seats in national assembly available and various political parties have begun their campaigns. Currently only three parties have a chance of gaining a majority, thus forming a new government. Which one shall prevail?
The army shall put an end to this chaotic democracy!
The time has come to elect a new president. All major forces in the country have put forward their candidates and the Duma is ready to assemble to vote on the new president.
column13: Пришло время избрать нового президента. Все главные политические силы страны выдвинули своих кандидатов и дума готова собраться, чтобы выбрать нового президента.

column2: Spiridon Merkulov, the leader of the ZK Party!
Boris Shumyatsky, the PFE Party representative!
column13: Борис Шумяцкий, представитель Дальневосточной народной партии

column2: Nikolay Smirnov, the PF Party representative!
column13: Николай Смирнов, представитель Партии народной свободы

column2: Gennadij Bukaev, the people's tribune of our time!
column13: Геннадий Букаев, народный трибун нашего времени

column2: Aleksander Kolchak, the former leader of Transamur, has passed away due to a heart attack. His death opens the field for various possiblities of political change in Transamur including the declaration of a republic, if Sergei Wojciechowski and his staff allows it.
Sergei Wojciechowski is the new leader of Transamur!
Aleksander Kolchak, the former leader of Transamur, has passed away due to a heart attack. A week of mourning was declared to honor this great hero of the Russian nation.
column13: Александр Колчак, бывший лидер Заамурья, умер от сердечного приступа. Объявлен недельный траур в честь великого героя русского народа.

column2: With the restoration of the Russian republic the Orthodox Church, under the leadership of the vocal Patriarch Mikhail Pol'skii, is demanding the reclarification of its legal status. He wants a constitutional ammendment passed on the issue of the national religion.
The Orthodox Church must have a role in Government!
column13: Православная церковь должна играть большую роль в правительстве!

column2: Despite the relative stability of our state, which was achieved by vigorous collaboration with our Japanese masters, the majority of the population remain discontented with our form of state. They are not content with the dictatorial rule of admiral Kolchak and demand that democratic and liberal reforms be implemented in Transamur. What shall we do?
Minor reforms should appease these dissenters!

Admiral Kolchak, the long term leader of the Transamur state, was forced to step down due to large unrest in Transamur. The democratic opposition used the vacuum left by Kolchak to gain control over the state, effectively transforming Transamur from a military junta into a democracy. How shall we react?
Demand the restoration of a military cabinet!
The Japanese are trying to destroy republic!
The Japanese feel threatened by the sudden restoration of democracy in Transamur and they have issued an ultimatum to us in which they demand the restoration of a military cabinet.
column13: Японцы расценили внезапное восстановление демократии в Заамурье как угрозу и предъявили нам ультиматум, в котором требуют возвращения военного правительства. В случае нашего отказа нам угрожают страшными последствиями...

column2: The Transamur Republic has taken great offence at our attempts to regulate their internal affairs and are severing all political ties with us!
column13: Заамурье отказалось принять наши требования, заявив что это их внутренние дела, а также разорвали все политические связи с нами!

column2: We can only let them go...
